programme.title: I Was Prey
programme.desc: Miten saalistajasta tulee uhri? Villielainten hyokkaysten kohteeksi joutuneet ihmiset kertovat jarkyttavista kokemuksistaan.

programme.title: Dodo Heroes
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 5/6. Koskettavassa sarjassa ihmiset tekevat kaikkensa, jotta pystyat auttamaan apua tarvitsevia elaimia ympari maailmaa. (Dodo Heroes, tosi-tv, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Uskomattomat puumajat
programme.desc: Pete ja NTS rakentavat viisitasoisen luontopaamajan Michiganin osavaltion For-Mar -luonnonpuistoon auttaakseen vuoden 2014 vesikriisista edelleen toipuvaa yhteisoa.

programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: Antonio rakentaa vuoristomajan, joka on turvallinen sokealle koiravanhus Chickielle. Lisaksi rakennetaan japanilaistyylinen koiraolohuone.

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Tassa erikoisohjelmassa lahdemme aloittelijoiden kanssa oppimaan, miten rikoksia vastaan taistellaan yhdessa USA:n vakivaltaisimmista kaupungeista.

programme.title: Phoenixin elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Tutkija McHugh loytaa koiran, jolta puuttuu jalka. Mita sille on tapahtunut? Tutkija AJ kauhistuu koiranpennun ollessa menehtymaisillaan punkkitartuntaan.

programme.title: In Search Of Monsters
programme.desc: Tutkijaryhma etsii vastauksia Mothmania eli koimiesta ymparoiviin mysteereihin. He tutkivat teorioita, joiden mukaan tama legendaarinen elainhahmo on poikkeus evoluutioketjussa.

programme.title: I Was Prey
programme.desc: Miten saalistajasta tulee uhri? Villielainten hyokkaysten kohteeksi joutuneet ihmiset kertovat jarkyttavista kokemuksistaan.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Kissojen kayttaytymista tutkiva Jackson Galaxy yrittaa auttaa perheita saamaan kurittomat lemmikkinsa aisoihin naiden vammautettua omistajiaan tai pilattua heidan ihmissuhteitaan.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Juuri syntyneella Talbert-kirahvilla ilmenee komplikaatioita. Lisaksi Robert pelastaa siimaan jumiin jaaneen joutsenen.

programme.title: The Zoo
programme.desc: Nuori saukko Monty ei pysty pureskelemaan ruokaansa ja syyna on mahdollisesti ientulehdus. Elaintenhoitajat kertovat, miten tarhan kolmea norsua hoidetaan.

programme.title: Kotielainten pelastaja
programme.desc: The barn joins forces with a charity to find homes for four neglected calves. Meanwhile, a litter of piglets are born and Chris builds a playground for the goats.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Tigger-kissan epatavallisia ruokailutottumuksia pidetaan tiukasti silmalla. Elainlaakari Jeff varoittaa sairaan koiranpennun omistajaa nettiostamisen vaaroista.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: NFL-supertahti Antonio Brown uskoo paasevansa taman vuoden Super Bowliin akvaariolla. ATM:n taytyy tehda vaikutus valtavalla akvaariolla ja lopputanssilla!

programme.title: Phoenixin elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Ongelmia aiheuttamassa. Tutkijat McHugh ja DaBolt paljastavat jarkyttavan laiminlyontitapauksen: 50 sairasta ja rujoa elainta loydetaan entisen koirankasvattajan kotoa.

programme.title: Phoenixin elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Matkailuvaunualueen tragedia. Tutkija Barkley loytaa kaksi koiraa kuolemaisillaan polttavassa helteessa. Tutkijoiden on kohdattava nainen, jonka myotatunto ylittaa hanen elaintenhoitokykynsa.

programme.title: Maatilan pelastajat
programme.desc: Marty estaa hirsimokkia sortumasta maahan tuhoisan maanjaristyksen jalkeen. Misty rakentaa luhistuneen kasvihuoneen tilalle uuden, ja Matt pystyttaa uuden rakennuksen.

programme.title: Hurjimmat minielaimet
programme.desc: Uusimmalla kamerateknologialla luonnollisessa ymparistossaan kuvatut minihirviot nayttavat taitojaan ja pullistelevat juuri niin isoina kuin ne kuvittelevat olevansa.

programme.title: Hurjimmat minielaimet
programme.desc: Maailman syrjaisimmista kolkista loytyy pienenpienia elaimia, jotka herattavat suurta kunnioitusta. Nama liskot ja otokat ovat monstereita, jotka hallitsevat elinymparistoaan miltei yliluonnllisilla kyvyillaan: ne voivat esimerkiksi muuttaa muotoaan ja ampua myrkyllista verta silmistaan.

programme.title: Uskomattomat puumajat
programme.desc: Pete rakentaa pollojen innoittaman kirjaston puuhun Pohjois-Carolinaan. Pollon kasvot syntyvat pyoreilla seinilla ja rakennuksesta syntyy oikea mestariteos.

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Tia Torres kuntouttaa kaltoinkohdeltuja amerikanpitbullterriereita ehdonalaisvankien avulla Villalobosin pelastuskeskuksessa. Tekemista riittaa, kun tyontekijoiden pyrkimyksena on myos muuttaa ihmisten asenteita kiisteltya ja pelattya koirarotua kohtaan.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Kissojen kayttaytymista tutkiva Jackson Galaxy auttaa epatoivoisia kissanomistajia, joiden kodit ja ihmissuhteet ovat riekaleina naiden hurjien lemmikkien vuoksi.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Juuri syntyneella Talbert-kirahvilla ilmenee komplikaatioita. Lisaksi Robert pelastaa siimaan jumiin jaaneen joutsenen.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Tigger-kissan epatavallisia ruokailutottumuksia pidetaan tiukasti silmalla. Elainlaakari Jeff varoittaa sairaan koiranpennun omistajaa nettiostamisen vaaroista.

programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: Antonio loihtii uuden kodin papukaijojen pelastuskeskusta pyorittavalle pariskunnalle ja 23 linnulle. Papukaijat saavat ulkoilmahakin, jossa ne voivat lentaa.

programme.title: Gamechangers: Inventing The World
programme.desc: Ohjelmassa seurataan alansa parhaita ja alykkaimpia tutkijoita, insinooreja, yrittajia ja keksijoita, jotka tekevat uraauurtavaa tyota etsiessaan seuraavia mullistavia keksintoja.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Villit ja vapaat Brownit elavat Alaskan eramaassa. Seitsenlapsisen perheen elama kaikkien modernien mukavuuksien ulkopuolella riippuu perheenjasenten keskinaisesta yhteistyosta.

programme.title: Maatilan pelastajat
programme.desc: Marty estaa hirsimokkia sortumasta maahan tuhoisan maanjaristyksen jalkeen. Misty rakentaa luhistuneen kasvihuoneen tilalle uuden, ja Matt pystyttaa uuden rakennuksen.

programme.title: I Was Prey
programme.desc: Miten saalistajasta tulee uhri? Villielainten hyokkaysten kohteeksi joutuneet ihmiset kertovat jarkyttavista kokemuksistaan.

programme.title: Dodo Heroes
programme.desc: Brittilainen Marine Pen Farthing johtaa Afganistanin ainoaa virallista elaintenpelastusorganisaatiota. Sotilaan pelastamat kuusi koiraa taytyy saattaa taman luokse Teksasiin.

programme.title: Uskomattomat puumajat
programme.desc: Pete rakentaa pollojen innoittaman kirjaston puuhun Pohjois-Carolinaan. Pollon kasvot syntyvat pyoreilla seinilla ja rakennuksesta syntyy oikea mestariteos.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Kissojen kayttaytymista tutkiva Jackson Galaxy yrittaa auttaa perheita saamaan kurittomat lemmikkinsa aisoihin naiden vammautettua omistajiaan tai pilattua heidan ihmissuhteitaan.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Irwinin perhe on vuoden kestaneiden metsapalopelastustoimien ja surrealistisen maailmanlaajuisen pandemiasulun jalkeen valmiita uuteen kauteen ja avaavat Australian elaintarhansa uudelleen ja palaavat rakkaan tyonsa pariin hoitamaan elaimia.

programme.title: The Zoo
programme.desc: New Yorkin Bronxissa sijaitsevassa elaintarhassa asuu yli 6000 elainta, joiden hyvinvoinnista vastaa 500 asialleen omistautunutta tyontekijaa. Sarja vie elaintarhan kiehtoviin kulisseihin, joissa jokainen paiva on taynna yllatyksia.

programme.title: Atlantan akvaario
programme.desc: Afrikanpingiviinien yhteiso toivottaa uusimmat jasenet tervetulleeksi parittelukauden jalkeen. Lisaksi uusi merisaukko laitetaan lajitoveriensa joukkoon.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Tiimi tekee avustustyota Lakota-reservaatissa South Dakotan osavaltiossa. Amy harkitsee hataleikkausta ranskanbulldoggille, joka on nielaissut suosikkilelunsa.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Wayde ja Brett suunnittelevat akvaarion San Jose Sharks -jaakiekkojoukkueelle. Rekvisiitaksi tulevat jaakiekkovalineet, joukkueen logo ja tietysti haikaloja!

programme.title: Phoenixin elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Maantiepoliisi. Tutkija McHugh vaistelee parhaansa mukaan liikennetta yrittaessaan pelastaa moottoritielle eksyneen koiran. Sitten han auttaa chihuahuaa, jolla on selkarankavamma.

programme.title: Phoenixin elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Kujalla syntynyt. Tutkija AJ nappaa kujalla synnyttaneen koiran pennut turvaan. Elainten ensihoitaja Kinsel yrittaa pelastaa vammautuneen linnun hengen.

programme.title: Maatilan pelastajat
programme.desc: Kausi 3 osa 4/13. Osa kaupunkilaisista on kyllastynyt hetkisen maailman sykkeeseen ja haluaa muttaa maalle. Maaseudulla asumisessa on kuitenkin erilaisia haasteita. Niinpa apuun kiitaa eras erityinen perhe. (Homestead Rescue, tosi-tv, USA, )

programme.title: Teksasin riistanvalvojat
programme.desc: Teksasin riistanvalvojat suojelevat seka ihmisia etta elaimia Yhdysvaltain toiseksi suurimman osavaltion laajalla alueella. Tyopaivien aikana vastaan tulee kaikkea mahdollista salametsastajista tulvien uhreihin ja vaarallisiin villielaimiin.

programme.title: Uskomattomat puumajat
programme.desc: Puukuiskaaja Pete Nelson ja hanen tiiminsa suunnittelevat salaisia piilopaikkoja asiakkaille, jotka etsivat yhteytta luontoon ja sisaista lastaan.

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Paikallinen nainen haluaa luovuttaa koiranpentuja, joista han ei enaa kykene huolehtimaan, mutta Tia jarkyttyy loytamastaan. M2 ja Kanani valmistautuvat muuttamaan uuteen kotiinsa.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Dokumenttisarja. Kaytosasiantuntija Jackson Galaxy auttaa perheita rauhoittamaan kurittomia kissoja, jotka muun muassa aiheuttavat eroja tai pistavat omistajansa jopa sairaalaan.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Irwinin perhe on vuoden kestaneiden metsapalopelastustoimien ja surrealistisen maailmanlaajuisen pandemiasulun jalkeen valmiita uuteen kauteen ja avaavat Australian elaintarhansa uudelleen ja palaavat rakkaan tyonsa pariin hoitamaan elaimia.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Tiimi tekee avustustyota Lakota-reservaatissa South Dakotan osavaltiossa. Amy harkitsee hataleikkausta ranskanbulldoggille, joka on nielaissut suosikkilelunsa.

programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 8. Suunnittelija Antonio Ballatore rakastaa elaimia. Hanen intohimonaan on yhdessa tiiminsa kanssa kunnostaa ransistyneita ja ahtaita koteja seka niiden pihoja uuteen, elain- ja ihmisystavallisempaan kuosiin. (Animal Cribs, lifestyle, USA, 2017)

programme.title: Great White Appetite
programme.desc: Tieteilijoilla ei ole tarkkoja tietoja suuren valkohain maarasta, lisaantymisesta eika ruokailutottumuksista. Onko uusista tiedoista apua?

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Alkaa uusintana. Seitsenlapsinen Brownin perhe asuu Alaskan eramaassa. Perheenjasenet ovat riippuvaisia toisistaan yrittaessaan selviytya karussa ymparistossa.

programme.title: Maatilan pelastajat
programme.desc: Kausi 3 osa 4/13. Osa kaupunkilaisista on kyllastynyt hetkisen maailman sykkeeseen ja haluaa muttaa maalle. Maaseudulla asumisessa on kuitenkin erilaisia haasteita. Niinpa apuun kiitaa eras erityinen perhe. (Homestead Rescue, tosi-tv, USA, )

programme.title: I Was Prey
programme.desc: Miten saalistajasta tuleekin saalis? Villielainten hyokkaysten kohteeksi joutuneet ihmiset kertovat kokemuksistaan.

programme.title: Fish Or Die
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 5/10. Nelja raskaan sarjan kalamiesta ja ystavysta yhdistaa sarjassa voimansa, silla he haluavat olla ensimmaisina kalassa maailman syrjaisimmilla vesilla. Vaikka henki menisi. Paastakseen katkettyjen, mystisten vesien ja niissa piileskelevien tarunhohtoisten kalojen luo Chris, Thad, Brian ja Jay joutuvat mm. istumaan ratissa ajotunteja laskematta, taittamaan taivalta kiikkeralla lautalla ja raivaamaan tietaan kesyttomassa viidakossa. (Fish or Die, tosi-tv, USA, 2019)

programme.title: Uskomattomat puumajat
programme.desc: Puukuiskaaja Pete Nelson ja hanen tiiminsa suunnittelevat salaisia piilopaikkoja asiakkaille, jotka etsivat yhteytta luontoon ja sisaista lastaan.

programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 8. Suunnittelija Antonio Ballatore rakastaa elaimia. Hanen intohimonaan on yhdessa tiiminsa kanssa kunnostaa ransistyneita ja ahtaita koteja seka niiden pihoja uuteen, elain- ja ihmisystavallisempaan kuosiin. (Animal Cribs, lifestyle, USA, 2017)

programme.title: Phoenixin elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Maantiepoliisi. Tutkija McHugh vaistelee parhaansa mukaan liikennetta yrittaessaan pelastaa moottoritielle eksyneen koiran. Sitten han auttaa chihuahuaa, jolla on selkarankavamma.

programme.title: Phoenixin elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Kujalla syntynyt. Tutkija AJ nappaa kujalla synnyttaneen koiran pennut turvaan. Elainten ensihoitaja Kinsel yrittaa pelastaa vammautuneen linnun hengen.

programme.title: New York: Americas Busiest City
programme.desc: From their base in Central Park, New York, Anita, Ade and Dan reveal the hidden systems and organisational miracles that keep the worlds busiest urban park clean and green.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild
programme.desc: Ben Fogle revisits former war correspondent Julius Strauss and his wife Kristin, who live in British Columbia. Their home is in the middle of a mountainous region that is home to grizzly bears.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Alaskans must rely on family to overcome rising waters as they seek the springs offerings. The Hailstones must work together to overcome a quickly flooding tundra.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben meets a family who have carved out a slice of wilderness for a simple life on an Isle of Wight cliff-side, but face legal challenges and the risk of a landslide.

programme.title: Human
programme.desc: During the height of the Ice Age, one of the coldest times humanity has ever known, Homo sapiens steps into the last habitable continents on the planet: the Americas. 4/5

programme.title: Fatal Forecast
programme.desc: Known as hurricanes in the North Atlantic Ocean, typhoons in the Northwest Pacific Ocean, and cyclones in the South Pacific and Indian Oceans, they are all the same thing: tropical storms. Every year, there seems to be an ever-increasing number of news stories about them.

programme.title: New York: Americas Busiest City
programme.desc: From their base in Central Park, New York, Anita, Ade and Dan reveal the hidden systems and organisational miracles that keep the worlds busiest urban park clean and green.

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Armed with his trusty 1913 Bradshaws Continental Railway Guide, Michael Portillo ventures east to the independent state of Ukraine, a land that was once part of the Russian empire. He starts his journey in the capital, Kiev, where he encounters mummified monks and two of the strongest women in the world. After a stop-off in the city of Lviv, he boards the night express to Odessa, where he finds a vibrant, cosmopolitan city, and rounds off this leg of his journey by visiting the opera.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben ventures off the wild coast of Northern Ireland to the remote and rugged island of Rathlin. He stays with 41-year-old Rauri Morgan, a former HR executive who turned his back on corporate life.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Johnny tracks some caribou. Sue spots some ptarmigan, the state bird of Alaska. Ricko Dewilde teaches his daughter the native way of exploring.

programme.title: Ancient Powers
programme.desc: In a world where enemies watch for weakness, our ancient powers must use all their strength and cunning to defend their people and conquer new lands. Who will rise to the challenge of the battlefield.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace explores the Axminster factory in Devon to reveal how 46,000 square metres of carpet are produced every year. He follows the production of one of their best sellers, the Havana Diamond Steel wool carpet.

programme.title: Solar System
programme.desc: Professor Brian Cox explores the solar systems wildest weather, encountering powerful lightning, strange metallic frosts and monsoon rains on a moon a billion kilometres from Earth.

programme.title: Spy in the wild
programme.desc: The Spy Creatures visit the lands of ice and snow beyond the Arctic and Antarctic circles.

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo takes in Georgia and Azerbaijan as he journeys through the former Russian empire. He begins in the port of Batumi, discovers a surprise 19th-century tea plantation in the West Georgian countryside, visits a private museum dedicated to Joseph Stalin - the most infamous Georgian of all - and discovers that a Briton was the first to conquer the highest mountain in the Caucasus range. Arriving in Azerbaijan, he learns about its role in the 19th-century oil industry.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: As daylight dwindles in the Alaskan wilderness, Life Below Zero turns its focus to the creatures that thrive in the darkness. This episode explores the challenges faced by Alaskans as they contend with the unseen threats that emerge under the cover of night.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben meets Jake Williams, a 70-year-old hermit living on the edge of a forest in the Cairngorms, who has made a home on the site of an ancient settlement and enjoys a diet of roadkill stir fry.

programme.title: Ancient Powers
programme.desc: Each episode uses the very latest scientific and archaeological discoveries to reveal the tools, technologies, strategies and systems that decided the fate of the ancient world.

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Yesterday HD12:00 PM to 1:00 PMWednesday 3 JanuaryShareAdd to Calendar+Berlin to StuttgartSeason 7 Episode 3 of 10SSubtitlesThis time, Michael Portillo ventures on a rail journey through Germany, guided by Bradshaws Continental Railway Guide published in 1936. Starting in the vibrant city of Berlin, Michael visits the Museum of Modern Art in Berlins Kreuzberg, where he sees how a leading artist of the era, George Grosz, warned of the rise of fascism in a haunting self-portrait. In the Schoneberg district of the capital, Michael researches the decadent night scene of the 1920s, and looks at how cabaret culture is being revived today. When he reaches Weimar, Michael investigates the beginnings of Bauhaus design and visits the movements first building, before travelling onto Stuttgart, where he takes a ride in a high-performance Porsche to the manufacturers Stuttgart headquartersGreat Continental Railway Journeys airs on Yesterday HD at 12:00 PM, Wednesday 3 January. (Subtitles.)TopicsLeisure hobbiesTourism ➝ TravelMichael PortilloPresenterAlison KrepsSeries EditorJohn ComerfordExecutive ProducerTom RichardsonDirector

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: With spring in full effect across the Arctic, residents of Alaska must seize seasonal opportunities. Sue Aikens sets out to hunt small game but must be wary of her recent surgery.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben visits Scott Brodie in Utah, who has built an off-grid life in the Canyonlands, and the episode explores Scotts resilience and the prepper mindset.

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Yesterday HD12:00 PM to 1:00 PMThursday 4 JanuaryShareAdd to Calendar+Palermo to Mt EtnaSeason 7 Episode 4 of 10SSubtitlesOn a railway journey from the capital Palermo, through the ancient town of Agrigento and the port of Siracusa, to Europes largest volcano, Mount Etna, Michael Portillo explores Sicilian life under the dictatorship. He also finds out how the dictator took on the Mafia and asks whether it is true that under Mussolini, the trains ran on timeGreat Continental Railway Journeys airs on Yesterday HD at 12:00 PM, Thursday 4 January. (Subtitles.)TopicsLeisure hobbiesTourism ➝ TravelMichael PortilloPresenterAlison KrepsSeries EditorJohn ComerfordExecutive ProducerDave MinchinDirector

programme.desc: Professor Brian Cox explores the solar systems frozen worlds. programme.title: Julius Caesar: The Making of a Dictator
programme.desc: As Caesar takes control of Rome and consolidates his grip over the republic, he awards himself ever-greater powers. Appointed dictator for one year to restore peace, he soon extends this to 10 years, then for the rest of his life. As his ambition turned to tyranny, a handful of senators, including some of his closest allies, plotted to end his rule by assassination. But will that be enough to save the republic?

programme.title: Suuri keramiikkakisa
programme.desc: Kausi 2, 5/8. Tassa jaksossa tavoitteena on tehda niin monta pikaria kuin mahdollista 15 minuutissa. Kilpailijoiden taytyy myos valaa kaksi valtavaa vaasia ja kayttaa ikivanhaa menetelmaa saviesineiden polttamiseksi maakuopassa. He lahtevat maaseudulle yopymaan ja kokeilemaan tata arvaamatonta metodia. Kuka heista tulee voittajana ja kenen taytyy lahtea kotiin?

programme.title: Murha paratiisissa
programme.desc: Kausi 2, 1/8. Poole tiimeineen tutkii sokeriplantaasin omistajan merkillista murhaa, joka tapahtui samana paivana, kun omistajalla piti olla tarkeaa kerrottavaa laheisilleen. Vaikka talo oli taynna vieraita, kukaan ei nahnyt kenenkaan menevan rikospaikalle tai poistuvan sielta. Aluksi raha vaikuttaisi olevan tarkein motiivi, mutta pian todisteet alkavat johtaa rikostutkintaa erikoisempaan suuntaan. Camille suostuu aitinsa mieliksi menemaan sokkotreffeille rakkauden jumalattaren juhlan kunniaksi, mutta treffipaikalla odottaakin melkoinen yllatys. Brittilais-ranskalainen kuvitteelliselle Karibian saarelle sijoittuva komediallinen rikossarja.

programme.desc: Ben tapaa Niallin, joka pelastaa ja hoitaa Koh Samuin katukoiria.

programme.title: Koko Britannia leipoo
programme.desc: Ensimmaista kertaa ohjelmassa jarjestetaan karamelliviikko. Leipurit saavat kolme tahmeaa haastetta, kuten supermakean oman taidonnaytteen ja kaksinkertaisen hollantilaisen teknisen haasteen.

programme.title: Murha paratiisissa
programme.desc: Kausi 2, 2/8. Kun nuori nunnakokelas kuolee tulipalossa, osa nunnista kertoo nahneensa luostarissa salaperaisen haamununnan. Tutkinnan yhteydessa paljastuu, etta nunnakokelaalla oli paljon ongelmia ja salaisuuksia, mutta abbedissan mielesta isa John ummisti silmansa tyton paheilta. Poole paattelee, etta kuolema ei ollut onnettomuus, vaikka Ikkuna oli kiinni ja ovi oli lukossa sisapuolelta. Rikostutkintaa mutkistaa Poolen pinttynyt inho nunnia kohtaan. Brittilais-ranskalainen kuvitteelliselle Karibian saarelle sijoittuva komediallinen rikossarja.

programme.title: Suuri keramiikkakisa
programme.desc: Kausi 2, 6/8. Tehtavat sen kuin vaikeutuvat! Kilpailijoiden taytyy tehda kreikkalainen uurna kayttaen vuosisatoja vanhaa sgraffito-tekniikkaa. Toisena tehtavana ovat venalaiset maatuskanuket, joiden taytyy menna sisakkain ja jossa myos koristelu on tarkeaa. Ketka paasevat semifinaaliin ja ketka kaksi kilpailijaa joutuvat jattamaan kisan kesken?

programme.desc: The Wattersons must get Anais to Daisyland before the park closes for good. / Anais starts aging prematurely due to the stress and pressure of looking out for the rest of her stupid family.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean visits a safari park where he catches the attention of a baby monkey and unknowingly takes the monkey home in his Mini. After hearing on the news that the monkey has been stolen, Bean attempts to return it without getting caught.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean fancies a game of golf so he creates his own golf course inside his flat and invites Irma to join him for a round. Their somewhat eccentric game takes them from sitting room to bathroom and through Mrs Wicket’s flat as they battle to be the winner of the First Bean Open Championship.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A crafty cat burglar is causing alarm and concern throughout the town with a series of daring rooftop robberies. After Mrs Wickets house is burgled and Bean has his wallet stolen he decides the only way to deal with this cunning housebreaker is to don a costume and become a superhero (like the ones in his favourite comic book). But Super Bean soon finds he has his hands full helping to rescue cats stuck in trees and old ladies with their spilled shopping.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is tidying his flat and chucking out a load of old unwanted junk. Unfortunately during the big clear out Teddy accidentally falls into a bin bag which gets put out in the street. Bean is horrified when the rubbish van arrives and he realises that dear old Teddy is now on his way to the landfill. Bean races across town to the dump but how will he ever find his friend amongst all the mountains of junk?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys a robot to clean his flat but it ends up trashing half the town.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Lilit creates a friends tree mapping out who everyone is best friends with in Mushton, she realizes Muddler has no friends at all. Unable to accept this, Lilit slips away to try and befriend him. But Muddlers perception of friendship is somewhat unique, meaning Lilit now needs the help of her two best friends, Mush-Mush and Chep, to escape from Muddlers clutches.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Having rescued a Mushlet, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit becomes heroes in Mushton, and theyre loving it! So Mushlers create a rescue team - but, alas, no one needs saving! How can you be a hero when there is nothing to be heroic about?!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Beacon Mushroom that guides the Mushables back to Mushton in the dark has gone out. So Lilit lights up and stands in its place for the night... and soon gets quite bored! Lilits good deed has her regretting her gift - shes basically just a lamp! But when her light goes out, Lilit instantly regrets regretting it: she wants her gift back!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Every time Mush-Mush has tried to surprise his friend with a gift, Chep has always found out what it was. But Chep promises that this time he wont. And Lilit, who is too honest to keep a secret, promises she wont let Chep know what the surprise is. Both of them find this so hard! But Mush-Mush is one step ahead of them...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mushpie loves to sing. Only problem she is terrible at it! But Lilit, who has never heard her sing before, wants to make Mushpie happy and organizes a concert for her to sing in front of all the other Mushables... who are terrified at the idea! But Lilit doesnt have the heart to admit this to Mushpie.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mushpot wishes he could roll back the seasons and relive being a Mushler, our friends get him to hang out doing cool Mushler stuff. But this just shows that Mushpot is no longer able to do all those things. Sigh! However, when our friends find a map that points to a treasure he buried when he was a Mushler, Mushpot realises its just the Mushler experience he needed.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings improvise a trampoline with bagpipes, only each jump is accompanied by a deafening outburst. Grizzy steps in and hurls the object far from the castle.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy puts a stop to the Lemmings furious rodeo game on a sheep. Annoyed, they decide to banish the bear to the bottom of the castle dungeons while hes taking a nap.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While fighting over a jelly cake, Grizzy banishes the Lemmings to the castle dungeons and the rodents discover a passageway leading to a secret elfin room.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings take Polaroid snapshots of themselves disguised outside the castle along with a sheep who poses with them.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is pulled out of his dreams by the rambunctious Lemmings who are jousting on sheep. The sly bear gets rid of the rodents by enticing their mounts away with food.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy pursues the Lemmings throughout the castle to recover the jelly cake they stole from him. In an impasse, the bear runs smack into a ghost.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a giant jelly cake. Their chase leads them to the castle library, where the Lemmings accidentally activate the opening of a secret passage.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy chases the Lemmings throughout the castle to swipe the delicious jelly cake they were about to eat. He locks them inside a closet and makes off with the dessert.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun bouncing off the backs of green frogs while Grizzy chases some mosquitos buzzing around him. Displeased, the rodents replace Grizzys green frogs with poisonous orange ones that paralyze anyone who touches them!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings improvise a trampoline with bagpipes, only each jump is accompanied by a deafening outburst. Grizzy steps in and hurls the object far from the castle.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is watching Clint Chiseljaw - his favourite action TV show - with Billy, but Mrs Wicket orders her nephew downstairs to finish his chores. Inspired by Clint’s catchphrase – “Nobody gets left behind”, Mr Bean tries a variety of different daring plans to break Billy out of Mrs Wicket’s flat. But none of them work, until he hits on the perfect plan… or so he thinks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean peers through the window of the opening party of an art exhibition and sees free snacks being handed around – yum! But he’s told by the bouncer that he needs to be smartly dressed. So he sneaks into the artist’s studio and paints a tuxedo onto himself. This time he’s let in, but will Bean’s fake painted suit last long enough for him to get his free food?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to watch the motor racing on TV, when Mrs Wicket interrupts him to offer a deal – revamp her garden with new paving and ornaments, and he’ll get a month’s rent for free. Bean reluctantly agrees, but when he sees Mr Paliwal finish a personal training session and keen for more, he offers him a new workout… doing all Mr Bean’s work for him while he watches the racing! Win, win!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is bored of queuing for a trampoline park, so secretly bounces in through a window using a trampette. But he soon gets on the wrong side of a young show-off boy who keeps stealing Teddy and throwing him in hard-to-reach spots. To settle their row, they agree on a race around the trampoline park – first place wins Teddy. Will Mr Bean triumph before he’s chucked out for jumping the queue?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma is struggling to sell items from her knitwear stall at the market, so sends Mr Bean to collect a sheep costume he can wear to attract customers. Once at the fancy dress shop however, Mr Bean gets stuck in the sheep costume and has to travel back to the market wearing it. Things go from bad to worse when Mr Bean takes a short cut across the field and gets caught up in a flock of real sheep!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean spots a rare book - the Teddy Bear Haunting - in a bookshop, but it’s too expensive to buy. He secretly tries to read it in the shop… until he’s thrown out. To his dismay someone else then buys the book – so he follows the buyer around trying to read over his shoulder. Will Mr Bean manage to get to the end of the book before getting spotted?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep has been watching Sushi-Mushi test new compost fritters recipes. When Mush-Mush gets to taste one, he can’t believe it: Sushi-Mushi has cooked the perfect fritter.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush wants to impress the Mushlets by showing off his sensing gift. But his sense-foot doesn’t work like it should. This is a disaster! And when Mushpot explains that some Mushables have to wait until they become Mushups to see their gifts fully developed, Mush-Mush is frustrated. He wants to master his gift now! Mush-Mush discovers that the solution he’s looking for might be in The Dark Dark Forest. Mush-Mush decides to take his friends Chep and Lilit on a little trip...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Mushlers lead Sushi-Mushi to believe that Pickled Swampost is Mushpot’s favourite dish when he cant stand it. Now they must try to stop Sushi-Mushi from serving this horrible food to Mushpot!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is the only Mushable who cant bend a small branch back to catapult himself between two trees. He feels weak and embarrassed. But when strength doesnt work, Chep realizes that its all in the technique!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings inherit a crate that fell off a Canadian army convoy. Inside, a case emits a sort of laser beam that divides objects into multiple miniaturized versions of themselves.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Near the supermarket a machine hands out surprise eggs in exchange for a coin. Amongst the lots to be won, there is a super firework rocket the Lemmings dream of, and a piece of costume jewelry that Grizzy imagines himself giving to his lady-love.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a high-tech gadget that enables you to learn anything within seconds. He can now become the perfect bear!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: How can one peacefully watch a documentary on salmon fish, nice and comfy on the sofa, when the Lemmings are playing chemistry novices with a fun experiment box?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzys TV remote control is stolen by a partridge who collects high-tech objects in his nest perched high up in a tree. This is a case of absolute urgency!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has got it into his head to offer a butterfly to the she bear hes in love with. But the Lemmings fight with him over the rare specimens hes spotted.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have discovered an addictive new game based on the astonishing bouncing properties of the rangers new running shoes. Grizzy, who is trying to relax, confiscates the shoes and soon realizes they are far more comfortable than his thongs.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy babysits for the she-bear he has a crush on. Theres no question of Grizzy tripping up for he has no intention of taking any risks! But he hadnt reckone

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Unwilling to share the food both he and the Lemmings are wild about, Grizzy locks it up inside the rangers brand new and apparently burglar proof safe.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean orders a takeaway pizza but when it arrives he feels let down by the size of it. So he sets out to bake his own unique Teddy shaped pizzas. Under the name Pizza Bean his pizzas become extremely popular and very soon business in booming. As a result rival pizza producer Don Crustyoni sees his profits plummeting and decides to make Mr Bean an offer he can’t refuse.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is not allowed to fly off on holiday as his passport has no photograph. After failing to get one from a photo booth he tries numerous other ways to get his photo taken including photobombing a tourist’s snap. None of these work but after Bean is arrested maybe the police can assist him. Say cheese!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants to impress Irma by entering them both into a dance competition at the local park. But his tango is terrible and his rumba ridiculous so he enrols for lessons at a local dance school. After an unsuccessful class at the dance studio and a trip to the library to teach himself Mr Bean has lost track of time. He needs to make it up to a disgruntled Irma but will his homemade effort ‘win’ her over.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean manages to get himself locked in a department store overnight while spending too long trying on clothes. Bean takes advantage of the situation having fun in the various departments. But when he discovers a robbery taking place the fun and games stop as the desperate burglar chases Bean from floor to floor and all around the store.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wickets nephew. He decides he must have his own console, only to discover how expensive they are. But as luck would have it, he arrives at the shop at closing time to discover that tomorrow there will be a special sale. All he has to do is be first in line.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a white bear that fell out of a zoo’s refrigerated truck. After consulting the encyclopedia, he realizes that he and the bear are brothers of the same species! He decides to follow the encyclopedia’s instructions to the letter and take care of his brother during his hibernation. This runs counter to all of the Lemmings favorite activities. The Lemmings decide to create a false encyclopedia page which says that they too are bears. Grizzy is now obliged to treat them like brothers as well.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings’ hard rock concert is driving Grizzy mad. After kicking them out, Grizzy requisitions their ghetto blaster and listens to a relaxation cassette to calm down. The Lemmings discover an ancestral tree whose engraved strips of bark cast targeted maledictions. To recover their material, the Lemmings decide to drive Grizzy out by cursing him with the Ten Plaques of the Savanna.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Inspired by a magazine, Grizzy decides to redo the cabin’s interior design. To make sure everything is perfect, he ousts the Lemmings and their electric train. By chance, the Lemmings discover an underground futuristic premises in the middle of the savanna. From this secret place, they can see the entire savanna on a giant screen, down to the very inside of Grizzy’s cabin just like in a sandbox video game. By using the menus, they can have an impact on reality and thus... on Grizzy!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a magic stick that functions as a Yummy divining rod. Grizzy steals their stick and finds a Yummy deposit in the savanna. To take control over Grizzy’s discovery, the Lemmings set a trap to draw the bear far from the deposit and transform it into an industrial chocolate factory. Grizzy will want to recover his chocolate deposit.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: An eclipse prevents the solar panels from supplying the cabin with electricity and Grizzy is disgruntledbecause he can’t watch TV. When he discovers that the Lemmings are using fireflies to have a party withoutelectricity, Grizzy evicts the Lemmings and recovers the fireflies to fuel the solar panels. The Lemmingshappen upon a jewel that gives them total control over the fireflies.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings recover a jar of Yummy from an automatic distributor but before they can enjoy it Grizzy confiscates the treat. In exchange, he leaves them the keyring that came as a gift. The Lemmings aren’t interested until the keyring lands in a magic vial which gives it an extraordinary power: stick the keyring onto any object and it will shrink to the size of a plastic miniature figurine!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang goes to Salem, Massachusetts, for the historical festival, only to discover history repeating itself as a demon has been set loose on the town, supposedly summoned by a witch as revenge for the infamous 17th-century Salem witch trials.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Shaggy drags the gang to an arcade where hes determined to finally collect enough tickets to win the prize hes wanted since he was a boy. Unfortunately, the animatronic mascot of the place has apparently come to life and has other ideas. / Fred comes face to face with his longstanding nemesis Captain Cutler who seems to have turned over new leaf as a restaurateur but is plagued by a ghostly pirate.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Everyone assumes that Harley Quinn is the culprit in a recent burglary. But as Batman and Bam pursue Harley, Bibi and Redbird begin to suspect that she may actually be innocent.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Buff trains with Batwing to improve his gracefulness and uses her lessons on a delicate mission against the Riddler.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders redesign the last hole of the ACME Acres miniature golf course. Porky is determined to make it just right for the children who will play on it.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Beaver Brothers hire The Looney Builders to build them a log cabin, but soon sidetrack the job by goofing around too much.

programme.title: Lu And The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.desc: The bugs talk about taking their time.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Envious of all the attention his landlady is receiving because of a broken leg, Mr. Bean decides to break his leg too. When he ends up in hospital under the care of the Matron from Hell he discovers there are some kinds of attention even he doesnt enjoy.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Whilst trying to redecorate the hall, Bean is obstructed at every turn by his landlady’s vile one-eyed cat. Bean pops it in the dustbin to keep it out of the way for a while. Just his luck that it’s rubbish collection day.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants an ice cream from the ice cream van but ends up serving himself – along with every kid in town.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is feeling very left out when he discovers that Mrs Wicket is having a huge party downstairs and apparently he isnt invited. Bean tries every trick in the book to sneak himself into the party - even resorting to hiding inside an enormous cake. If only he knew the real reason for the celebration.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean’s attempt to cut the grass is thwarted by a pesky root which refuses to budge. When Mr Bean breaks his spade he heads to the local Garden Centre to find a replacement. But instead of simply buying one he enters a gardening competition to win one - judged by none other than the Queen herself! Its gardening gloves off when Mr Bean goes into battle with his rival green-fingered competitors.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput has escaped yet again, and yet again, Specs and Skinny are in serious trouble with the Boss. He’s so fed up with their constant failure that he hires an out-of-towner: a super cool, hi-tech Doc who has all the moves and the attitude to match. The new guy’s hip to all of Lamput’s tricks, and before long, the shape shifting blob is safely back at the Lab. Specs and Skinny, robbed of their whole gig, end up on the streets, while Rival Doc gets all the glory. With glory comes blame, though, and when Lamput stages yet another signature crafty escape, the Boss turns all his fury on Rival Doc. Who hired this guy, anyway!? Lamput just wants things to be how they were. The orange blob helps the Docs get back their jobs at the Lab, Rival Doc is sent packing, and Lamput prepares yet another daring escape.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput’s been caught! The Docs don’t have much to do now but to give tours to visiting students. Until one of these students, Tuzki specifically, gets lost. Will Tuzki find his way back to class? Not unless Lamput has something to do with it.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: While trying to escape from the Docs at a small sea side town, Lamput meets a lonely sea monster. Lamput attempts to help the sea monster makes friends but all his plans backfires. Now the locals are enraged, and the docs take the opportunity to stir up an angry mob to take down the creature and catch Lamput in the process! Not unless Lamput’s new friend has anything to say about it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings throw a surprise birthday party for one of the clan. When Happy Birthday rings out, the surpriiiiiise! is as great for Grizzy, who is trying to take a nap after a hearty meal, as it is for the birthday Lemming hero in question. From that point on, Grizzy has only one objective: stop the din, which is not at all helping his migraine headache. But for the Lemmings, the party must go on at any price.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A gust of wind sweeps away the flower that Grizzys adored she-bear wears in her hair. Grizzy sees this as a golden opportunity to dazzle her by bringing it back. But the Lemmings, who are riding on the back of a bucking caribou, realize that the flower makes their mount sneeze, which only makes the game ten times more fun!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds two identical vases in a Native American chest. They are communicating vessels, so if he sticks his hand in one, it comes out the other, regardless of the distance between them. This should satisfy Grizzys natural lazy streak, unless the Lemmings realise the incredible games they could play with the magic vases.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a vintage stopwatch in the garage which lets you wind back the minute that has just passed by and it can even stop time and movement in ones surroundings. This will give him a sure advantage over the Lemmings, provided of course they dont get their hands on it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is disturbed in the middle of his TV snack by a strange flow of incongruous objects that have been transformed into hot-air balloons. When he sees the Lemmings onboard these curious zeppelins, Grizzy understands that he will quickly have to confiscate their helium tank and balloons if he wants to relax in front of the TV.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers with great delight that the ranger has purchased a brand new multifunction Stressless recliner. But even an armchair designed for well-being - the ultimate in relaxation - can used for other purposes by the Lemmings, who transform it into a fearsome multi-game chair.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom takes a shot to the kisser that knocks the cat out.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Hildie and Beatie bring home a magic ogres tooth.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Rick accidentally locks Tom and Jerry in the garage.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The butler asks Tom to rid the upstairs of a mouse before the owners return. If Tom succeeds, hell live and work the rest of his life upstairs.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry find themselves in a garden growing contest – that turns out badly for Tom.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom has planned an afternoon rendezvous with Toodles.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Ducky and Quizz steal the Bat-Signal’s one-of-a-kind lightbulb, Bam and Batwing must find a way to restore the legendary light so Batman knows when Gotham needs him.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Kitty is staying over at the Batcave for a sleepover, but getting her to lie down for a catnap is no easy task as the Batwheels have to find creative ways to get her to sleep.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry Gokko
programme.desc: Jerry sneaks into the party set up to steal some cheese while Tom is sleeping. Tom wakes up and chases Jerry across a table filled with all kinds of food. During the chase, Tom eats a melon which turns him into a sphere shape and Jerry eats a piece of cheese which turns him into a triangle shape.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series

programme.title: Batwheels

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Much to everyone’s surprise, Bam is secretly afraid of the dark. When Poison Ivy knocks out all the power in Gotham, Bam must conquer his fears to stop her.

programme.title: Batwheels

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants an ice cream from the ice cream van but ends up serving himself – along with every kid in town.

programme.desc: Mr Bean’s attempt to cut the grass is thwarted by a pesky root which refuses to budge. When Mr Bean breaks his spade he heads to the local Garden Centre to find a replacement. Its gardening gloves off when Mr Bean goes into battle with his rival green-fingered competitors.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Irma are off for a day at the seaside. Irma is travelling light but Bean wants to take almost everything his owns in an enormous trunk. As Bean entertains Irma pulling rabbits out of hats the angry magician arrives on the scene - and he’s not a happy bunny.

Unfortunately Irma Mrs Wicket and The Bruisers all want to join in the fun with him.

programme.desc: Everyone in Mushton is finding that their precious wooden things are being munched and destroyed by someone or something.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables

But Lilit and Mush-Mush convince their friend not to give up. Chep decides to play his favourite moss-marble: the Rollinator. The one marble he never risked playing before...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize an obstacle course in their cabin. Grizzy ejects the Lemmings from the cabin and they crash onto an Incan temple where they discover a spheric object that can control the Earths rotation.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings get hold of an old pinball machine and install it in the cabin. Their furious party interrupts Grizzys nap and the bear threatens to break the contraption.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy, a big chocolate lover, is growing a young cacao tree under an ultraviolet lamp. During a trampoline session, the Lemmings accidentally break the lamp, provoking a supernatural reaction.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: During a fight, Grizzy and the Lemmings stumble upon a Mayan temple lost in the jungle. Once inside, they set off a magic reaction that creates doubles of themselves at different ages. They now have a Grizzy babe and elderly Lemmings. Grizzy tries to get the young bear interested in a documentary on salmon, while the Lemmings want to initiate their ancestors to dance. But age differences are not so easily defeated.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Short on food supplies, Grizzy has gone out to gather fruit. He comes back with a basketful but discovers that the Lemmings have stolen the last of the chocolate spread.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings take off with the last jar of Yummy chocolate spread. Grizzy catches up with them but they drop the jar and it lands in a nearby sacred temple. Grizzy and the Lemmings must solve riddles along the path to the Yummy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize wrestling combats on the living room couch. Grizzy, weary of the clamor, stops the match. The displeased Lemmings retaliate, but during their fight the cabins wood floor caves in and they all fall into an old sidecar!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After a spat over a jar of Yummy, Grizzy and the Lemmings find gold leaf-wrapped chocolate bits scattered in the jungle. Delicious! On the backs of a bat and a tapir, the rodents and the bear fight over the harvest of candy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Night has fallen, and the solar panels do not generate enough electricity to charge Grizzys TV. He sees the Lemmings playing with fireflies that could make his panels work and tries to distract the Lemmings and capture the fireflies.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy are enjoying a day at the arcade, when Mr Bean gets carried away with the dance machine, knocking Teddy onto the floor. Teddy’s picked up, put on a trolley of stuffed toys and figurines – and soon enough, he’s been put in the claw machine as a prize! Mr Bean has run out of coins, so has to find a way of winning Teddy back without looking like he’s cheating!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy are looking forward to seeing a once-in-a-lifetime comet – but it won’t appear until 4am! He tries to stay up, but it’s useless – he keeps dropping off. So instead, Mr Bean decides to go to bed and set an alarm – yet he over-winds the clock and it breaks! With all the shops closed, his only option is to build his own complicated version to make sure he doesn’t miss the comet…

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs Wicket makes Mr Bean drive her to the hospital to get her ingrown toenail seen to and asks him to wait. Mr Bean gets bored, and on a wander around the hospital he finds a spare doctor’s outfit with stethoscope – great Teddy - I’ll give you a check-up! But a nurse spots him, and thinking he’s a new doctor Mr Bean is asked to visit patients. How long can he keep it up before he’s found out?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at the supermarket when he spots a cool fire engine ride – but the security guard makes it clear it’s for little kids only. Not to be deterred, Mr Bean tries everything he can to distract the guard to have his go on the ride. When he finally does get his go, it’s not as good as he thought it would be, especially when a real fire engine has to be called to help Mr Bean!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean receives a delivery of a bunch of flowers for Mrs Wicket, but accidentally runs them over in the his car. He can’t afford to replace them, so he decides to recreate the bunch by taking flowers one by one from anywhere he can - a vase in a cafe, a wedding bouquet, even from between the teeth of a tango dancer! But will he assemble the bunch and be back in time for Mrs Wicket?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean gets so engrossed playing with Mr Paliwal’s new drone that he doesn’t notice a car thief stealing his car. They quickly jump into Mr Paliwal’s car and use the drone to track the stolen car to the thief’s warehouse hideout. Using the drone, they discover a criminal car-stealing operation – but will they be able to outwit the car thieves using Mr Paliwal’s flying gadget?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: It seems like Starmush is the only one who can answer Mush-Mushs difficult questions. But Starmush lives so far away in the Dark Forest! Mush-Mush hatches a plan to get Starmush to move to Mushton, so he can get answers right here at home.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit remembers loving balancing on a slack-vine when she was a Mushlet. But actually, she never really learnt how, so she keeps falling off and getting really frustrated.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep and Mush-Mush sometimes don’t listen to Lilit. So when she tries to tell them about her great idea to have a special firefly night, they instead believe it is their idea. Grrr! Whose special firefly night will come out on top?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Bolly hurts his foot and can’t go fast until it heals. Phooey! But when everyone gives him treats to cheer him up, Bolly decides he never wants his foot to heal.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is over-joyed when his weevil friend, Chase, returns to Mushton. But Chase seems to have changed, hes way harder to handle now. And he wants something from Chep! But what?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is impressed by the TV show of a magician who transforms a partridge into a bouquet of flowers. To get rid of the Lemmings once and for all, for they exasperate him with their incessant games, Grizzy tries the magic trick on them. And apparently... it works!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Its hot out and when Grizzy sees an ice cream commercial on TV, he has a sudden craving. Unfortunately, the Lemmings made it to the deep-freeze in the garage before him and emptied it out to make themselves a sled run in the backyard with strawberry-vanilla ice cream. For Grizzy, theres no question that the stock they possessively watch over in an icebox winds up as powder snow!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The only edible food item left in the rangers cabin is a gorgeous salmon, which is stuck inside a block of ice at the back of the freezer compartment.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have unearthed a box filled with birthday fountains of light that spit forth giant bursts of sparks. They have a blast straddling these fabulous toys, swirling in every which direction, but their new game is not really compatible with a bears nap.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Wedged in his sofa to relieve his aching back, Grizzy balks at getting up. He designs clever strategies to do everything from a distance, including confiscating the Lemmings radio-controlled toy robot-transformer which he will use as a butler.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The vibrations created by Grizzys snoring during his nap give the Lemmings an idea for a bouncing game. But when Grizzy changes positions and his snoring stops, the Lemmings must find other sources of vibrations. Only these are no longer compatible with Grizzys nap.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a birthday piñata in the rangers living room. The idea of bursting open a papier-mâche statue with a bat like it says in the instructions pleases him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Inside a mysterious cave Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a magical Game of the Goose. / Grizzy is bothered by an object stuck in between the sofa cushions: a big fur lemming puppet glove. / Grizzy discovers the leftovers of a Halloween party in the rangers cabin which was entirely redecorated for the occasion. / Grizzy wants to give the she-bear hes in love with a plastic ring which he finds really swell.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean dog-sits for Irma and while in the park comes across a professional dog-walker. This guy’s making a fortune while Bean is doing it for free! That evening posters go up and the next morning Bean has four dogs to look after. But who is going to walk whom?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean ends up in a farm slurry pit after racing a tractor. The car smells Teddy smells Bean smells … bad. He comes home determined to clean all three. A determination that winds up with him locked outside on the roof and completely stark naked.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Its Irmas birthday. Bean buys a bargain-bin load of cards, and writes out two - one nice, one silly. He gets his envelopes mixed up and sends off the wrong card. He tries to persuade the postman to hand the card back, but no luck. He winds up causing chaos at the sorting office in a last-ditch attempt to avoid Irmas ire.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he cant. Next morning, and after an awful nights sleep, he goes to buy a brand-new bed. He has fun trying all the beds out, but the one he wants is too expensive. He is about to get thrown out of the shop when he turns his experience of all the beds to his advantage.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is jealous of the Lemmings’ new game: an interactive dance mat connected to the TV where the idea is to jump around and perform dance sequences. As they fight over the mat, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a hidden mechanism in one of the Great Wall of China’s watchtowers. The mechanism activates a game on the wall’s paving stones that is similar to the interactive mat, only life size. On your marks, get ready, dance!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings are hungry! While fighting over a jar of Yummy chocolate spread, the jar is destroyed. But Grizzy discovers an ingenious manner to recover the remains of another Yummy jar using instant Chinese noodles as inspiration. The result is delicious. Grizzy and the Lemmings will once again fight over this new Yummy-based recipe: Choco-noodles.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings, who are both starving, discover a temple dedicated to an ancestral brioche. According to the book lying open inside the temple, to obtain a perfect brioche you must gather three gold ingredients and set them on the altar. When the panda idol who guards the temple receives the offering, the person will receive his favorite food in abundance. Grizzy and Lemmings set out to find the sacred ingredients but there is no question of working together. May the best critter win!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: An integrated circuit containing an artificial intelligence accidentally connects to Grizzy’s stuffed teddy bear, which comes to life like a modern-day Pinocchio. Grizzy educates the chip until it decides to connect to the Lemmings’ robot to play with them. When the AI becomes a teenager, it is no longer interested in either Grizzy or the Lemmings and prefers using a smartphone to keep learning. Grizzy and the Lemmings join efforts to try and reset the chip’s memory and relive its childhood phase over and over.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a large silkworm that produces an extremely soft and resilient elastic thread ad infinitum. The Lemmings consider the worm the ideal game companion, but Grizzy needs the worm to make his knitwear. To become masters of the silkworm, the close enemies will go to harsh extremes.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a crate of cell phones: there’s one for everyone. But before being able to play with their new toys, they need to charge the batteries. This operation uses all the electricity stored in the cabin’s solar battery and prevents Grizzy from watching TV. Grizzy soon realizes that this is the least of his worries, for living with the Lemmings and their phones is a guaranteed nonstop stream of noise pollution.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Fred and the gang are called in to help with a mystery involving a figure from Freds past, Professor Huh? Fred discovers Rose, with whom he learned mystery solving until they had a falling out, has also arrived with her gang.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Fred and the gang are called in to help with a mystery involving a figure from Freds past Professor Huh? Fred discovers Rose his old childhood friend with whom he learned mystery solving until they had a falling out has also arrived with her gang. The race to see which gang could solve the mystery first is on as the rest of the gang learns theres more to this story than meets the eye and Freds interest in finding Professor Huh? is as personal as it gets.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Badcomputer captures Bibi and disguises Jestah to take her place with the Batwheels so that Jestah can steal the Batcomputers motherboard. Can Bibi get free in time to unmask the imposter and save the day?

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When the Legion of Zoom plan to cheat their way to winning the Gotham Grand Prix, the Batwheels zoom into action to ensure the race is won the right way - fair and square !

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build a skate park for the kids, but it soon interferes with Hoots Talon and his friends’ activities. / The Looney Builders face underwater challenges as they build a sea school for Moxie Manatee.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: As The Looney Builders build Kathy Bat an upside-down radio station, Porky has concerns but doesn’t speak up.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A quick shop turns chaotic as Mr. Bean battles a mile-long list and a wonky trolley, turning a simple errand into a full-blown comedy of errors.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When nursing an injured magpie in his room, Mr. Bean learns something the rest of us already know: magpies can’t help stealing anything that sparkles. When the police arrive to investigate the theft of his landlady’s jewellery, it’s not just Mr. Bean that needs to take flight.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Irma are off for a day at the seaside. Irma is travelling light but Bean wants to take almost everything his owns in an enormous trunk. Arriving at the seaside Bean’s trunk gets accidentally swapped with a trunk belonging to a famous stage magician. As Bean entertains Irma pulling rabbits out of hats the angry magician arrives on the scene - and he’s not a happy bunny.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves playing in the neighbourhood soft play centre – bouncing on the trampolines whizzing down the slides and most of all immersing himself in the ball pool. But he doesn’t like sharing the place with all those annoying kids. So Bean decides to turn his flat into his own private play area where he can play in peace. Unfortunately Irma Mrs Wicket and The Bruisers all want to join in the fun with him.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean orders a takeaway pizza but when it arrives he feels let down by the size of it. So he sets out to bake his own unique Teddy shaped pizzas. Under the name Pizza Bean his pizzas become extremely popular and very soon business in booming. As a result rival pizza producer Don Crustyoni sees his profits plummeting and decides to make Mr Bean an offer he can’t refuse.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Turns out constant, relentless failure can put a strain on a relationship. Specs and Skinny are no exception, and when yet another chase ends in embarrassment, misfortune, and physical injury, the Docs finally fall prey to “irreconcilable differences”. For a shapechanger, Lamput sure doesn’t like change; it’s like mum and dad are fighting. Lamput sets about trying to help the Docs patch things up. When conventional methods fail, our orange buddy is forced to subvert the very fundamentals of animated storytelling. Lamput’s perseverance finally pays off. The Docs have an epiphany: this blob trying to fix our friendship? Obviously that’s the real enemy.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs’ latest invention generates identical versions of themselves and create a whole mob of ‘Duplicate’ Specs and Skinnies to catch Lamput! However, the device becomes faulty, and the Duplicates can’t be turned off. Now the Docs are stuck with annoying copies of themselves who are turning their lives upside down!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: When Lamput disguises himself as a book and gets returned to the Library, the Docs have to be super quiet in their attempts to get him back. They finally manage to sneak past the Librarian, but all chaos erupts when they open a mysterious book in the restricted area. Lamput and the Docs have to team up to get the new ghostly resident back to where he belongs!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings play kite-surf with a homemade kite. Grizzy notices that the she-bear hes in love with watches the kite perform arabesques in the sky with admirat

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy snatches the last jar of chocolate spread out from under the noses of the Lemmings. In exchange, he offers them the toy stuck inside the lid: a mini-flute.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings play a new game, floating like flags in the breeze from the fan set on maximum. But Grizzy quickly rids the living room of this interference.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun tearing down their Kapla block buildings, which they rebuild just as fast. Grizzy finds that the she-bear hes in love with is impressed by the construction.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings draw inspiration from lessons they find in a martial arts book and start breaking every wooden object they can get their hands on into two.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy dreams that hes a valiant knight who has just delivered his beloved. As he is about to take her in his arms, he is woken by the din of the Lemmings, who have chosen this particular day to blast music. Grizzy has only one desire: pick up his dream where he left off. But first, hell have to stop the Lemmings fiesta.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: An overly ambitious young house sitter ruins Toms plans to rule the roost while Rick and Ginger are away. Jerry relishes in Toms predicament, that is until the house sitter spots the mouse and he becomes enemy number one!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Hildie receives another dozen black roses from a secret admirer, her curiosity is piqued. Sending Tom and Jerry to find out the identity of the mystery admirer, they end up at the Enchanted Flower Shop across the forest, where they encounter some frightful arrangements and a few dead ends.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A sales representative offers Tom all sorts of materials to finally catch Jerry.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ricks taken up painting to help him relax. Although hes warned them to stay out of his studio, Tom and Jerry inadvertently destroy his first painting. In an effort to reproduce it before he returns home, Tom and Jerry end up in a competition to prove whos the better artist. May the best Renoir win!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry try to locate a dog somewhere in the city, whose barking is keeping them awake.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ricks installed a state-of-the-art home automation system.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird learns a lesson in asking for permission when he takes one of Buffs stuffed animals without asking. When the stuffed animal accidentally gets swiped by the Legion of Zoom, Redbird will have to rescue the stuffed unicorn or admit to Buff what he did.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Bam is covered in super bouncy Bounce X goo during a chase with Prank, he must learn to use his newfound bouncing abilities to his advantage. / Bam must learn to adapt and try something new as he’s tasked to dive the Bat Big Rig all the way to Star City, while the Legion of Zoom chases after him.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry Gokko
programme.desc: Tom is taking selfies and enjoying a sweet snack at the candy shop, when Jerry and Tuffy sneak up and eat his strawberries. Tom proceeds to chase after them, but Tuffy falls into the claw machine. Jerry tries to save him, and Tom fishes them out. Tom makes Tuffy cry and apologizes by feeding him sweets.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang heads to a Renaissance Faire where they must stop an evil court jester from ending the kings reign…permanently!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: When the ghost of a small towns founder returns to scare off mayoral candidates, the gang decides to run Velma as mayor to bait the ghost. They quickly discover however, that Velma lacks the skill set to make her a popular politician.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan into raising money for the local donkey sanctuary. He tries to thwart Declan’s success and increase the amount of money he’s raising until eventually he finds himself challenging Declan to a sky-diving competition.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Great Eduardo, violinist supreme, is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert. But Bean wont pay for the tickets. More than that, he claims that he can play the violin better. Now he has to prove it. After a lot of painful sawing, even Eduardo cant bear the noise. He offers to teach Bean, who ends up replacing him in the concert!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Miss Wince takes Mrs. Wicket off on holiday in her brand-new, swanky caravan; and Bean is left behind. Butnever one to let a setback knock his confidence, he decides to build his own caravan and sets off in search of the perfect quiet spot. All would be well if hed only not built the caravan out of Mrs. Wickets garden shed ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is trying to impress some kids in the park with his football skills but winds up kicking their ball into a dilapidated, scary-looking house. He has to go in and get it back. A feral cat living inside decides to steal Teddy, and in the chase around the insides of the house Bean manages something not even a wrecking ball can do.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean accidentally spills all of Mrs. Wickets new, expensive perfume on the floor. In an attempt to hide his crime and refill the empty bottle, he tries to recreate the smell - by adding all sorts of odd and strange ingredients. He might be able to fool Mrs. Wicket, but can he fool Scrapper and all the neighbourhood cats?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy dreams that hes a valiant knight who has just delivered his beloved. But first, hell have to stop the Lemmings fiesta.
