Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Inspired by a magazine with a jewellery ad showing a man offering a diamond to a woman, Grizzy imagines himself offering the rangers engagement ring to his beloved she-bear.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When he accidentally sticks a computer microprocessor to his temple, Grizzy is transformed into an exceptionally intelligent being capable of predicting events to come far in advance. With his way above average IQ, not only will he be able to provide himself with the latest high-tech comfort, getting rid of the Lemmings should be a piece of cake.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy gleefully discovers that he can print images taken with the rangers camera which is connected to a state-of-the-art printer. He decides to immortalize and frame himself…

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A van pulls up to the rangers cabin to deliver a crate of jars of chocolate spread. While Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a wrecking bar to open it, someone steals the crate.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Like usual, Grizzy picks the door of the Rangers log cabin to come in and make himself comfortable, but this time its impossible to enter! The Lemmings have requisitioned the cabin for a party and barricaded themselves inside. Grizzy has no intention of waiting for an invitation to find a way to get in.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have got their hands on a pack of white beans which have very strange properties: when mixed with soda, anyone who eats them turns into a bouncing ball.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Fearful that he will lose his place in the Manor, Tom adopts the attitude of a member of the Royal Guard in order to keep the mice and their new friend, Boswell, from wreaking havoc in the kitchen.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Jerry uses a friendly tick to get even with Tom.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The detectives help a team of Huskies find the villain who is determined to sabotage their dog sled race.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom must enlist the neighborhood cats to help him remove the cat hairs from Ricks new massage chair.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry become obsessed with the contents of a wrapped package and go to extraordinary measure to find out whats inside without being caught by Rick and Ginger.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: An animated series following the antics of a cat named Tom - who is always in pursuit of a mouse named Jerry - and the rivalry between the two characters. A scarecrow terrorises Catsylvania.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Mistaken for a rare breed of Guinea Pig by the Duchesss professor friend, Jerry uses his protected, elevated status to create endless problems for Tom.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry have to contend with a baby polar bear that has been mistakenly delivered to Rick and Gingers house.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Jerry helps a Leprechaun retrieve the pot of gold that hes lost to Tom.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Beans frogspawn has grown into hundreds of little frogs. But, the mayor will come by soon. Bean has to catch the slippery green animals, but thats not that easy.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean meets an aristocratic old lady when he nearly runs over her lapdog with his mini. He’s thrilled to be invited for luncheon at her grand but strangely shabby mansion. Bean is determined to rise to the occasion. He’s so busy with matters of protocol he doesn’t notice that the lady and her sinister butler aren’t quite what they seem…

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has forgotten hes supposed to be cooking dinner for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. He dashes to the supermarket to buy some groceries but why buy food when you can win an entire trolley full in an All You Can Eat Competition? But Mr Bean has some stiff competition - no one can eat one of Mr Magg’s pies quicker than Mr Maggs himself. Mr Bean has to think fast to win. But after all that eating will Bean still be in the mood to cook a romantic meal?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is in need of a sturdy new bookcase and sets off to visit a furniture warehouse. He finds one that’s perfect but is outraged when he’s told he has to build the bookcase himself! Bean is unfamiliar with flat pack assembly and struggles to construct his new bookcase failing miserably when he discovers he’s one screw short. Mr Bean heads back to the shop only to find it’s closed!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After he causes the Batwing to crash, Bam becomes obsessed with making it up to her during a high-stakes aerial mission against Penguin and his giant ducky blimp.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Everyone is ecstatic when Bibi, Batgirl, and Robin capture Toyman and his Do-Over remote - except for Bibi, who failed to stick the landing on a big jump. Unwilling to accept her failure, Bibi uses Toymans Do-Over remote until she perfects her jump!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Bam is sent to take on Prank, Redbird is forced to hang back because The Jokers van is too dangerous! When Bam discovers that Redbird secretly tagged along, hes upset... until Redbird bails him out of a tight spot.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After Jestah’s insults get the best of her, a short-tempered Bibi tries to not let the big-wheeled bullys words get to her so she can help Batgirl catch Harley.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: Take to the skies over Gotham with Batwing and her friend best jet-friend Goldie the Arrowplane!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build their headquarters a car wash. Daffy doesn’t want to wash Dumpy and goes to extreme lengths to keep him dirty and preserve their memories.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Sunny Seagull hires The Looney Builders to build a carnival on Looneyburg’s pier. The crew gets so caught up trying to win the games that they lose sight of what matters.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: With their endless battles over the rangers cabin which they do not want to share, Grizzy and the Lemmings end up blowing the cabin up. Amidst the debris, they discover a strange pack: an army tent with all the necessary equipment to recreate a home in nature. Its the chance to discover the joys of camping in the wild.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings encounter a white bear which has drifted all the way to them on a chunk of ice which is slowly melting. The bear makes a fabulous rodeo partner, he just needs enough ice to keep cool. Even a few ice cubes on his head are enough. The only obstacle to this beautiful friendship is Grizzy, who considers himself master of the fridge and thus of the cabins ice production.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy gets rid of the Lemmings by crushing them with one of the rangers heavy trunks, which he immediately clears out of the cabin, his enemies stuck to it like stickers. What he doesnt know, is that the trunk contains a multifunction drone, complete with joystick and virtual reality headset, which enables embedded piloting. Thanks to this cutting-edge technology, the Lemmings decide to regain control of the situation!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover a strange pond in an American Indian grotto that has the power to rejuvenate anyone who dips in it. They spray a bit of the water of youth onto Grizzy and he instantly turns into a harmless cub they can easily rid themselves of. But the effects of the waters are only temporary.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings happen on a native American Indian burial place under the rangers cabin. When they accidentally activate a magic disk representing the earth, they are sent back in time to the prehistoric era...

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Safety standards at the Docs Lab remain shockingly low. Once, just once, it would be nice to invent something that doesnt then get out of hand and backfire, causing widespread chaos. Well, this shrink ray aint it. At first it works great (which is typical). Lamput is caught in a tiny vial, and the Docs are riding high on the triumph. Then they go over a small bump. Their risk management plan doesnt account for a small bump. Before long Lamput and Skinny are engaged in a high speed chase through the Boss moustache. Seriously. Someone should just shrink this Lab right out of existence. No, wait, that happens too.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Pursuing Lamput is a dastardly career, but theres a right and a wrong way to go about it. Doc Specs cuts corners, showing up at the Lab with a fake Lamput made out of a jar of marmalade and a couple ping pong balls - a Jamposter! Specs relishes his new role as hero of the day, but his best friend Skinny smells a rat. As does Lamput, who is patently NOT captured. Not to mention a battalion of ants who dont care at all about Specs professional fortunes. Specs plan has a serious use-by date. Lucky Skinny can forgive. As a friend, hes the real deal.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: To escape the clutches of his dastardly pursuers, Lamput leaps onto Skinnys head and poses as a luscious mane of auburn hair. Shouldnt work. Works. Too well; Specs falls head over heels for this new redhead. Skinnys a bit puzzled as to why his bespectacled buddy is acting so weird all of a sudden. The course of true love never runs smooth; nor does the course of a moronic mixup between two annoying nerds. A wigless Skinny crashes Specs big fancy date (which, you know, Skinny was invited to) and Specs is very rude indeed about it. Now theyve both got broken hearts. Luckily ice-cream fixes everything.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he cant. Next morning, and after an awful nights sleep, he goes to buy a brand-new bed. He has fun trying all the beds out, but the one he wants is too expensive. He is about to get thrown out of the shop when he turns his experience of all the beds to his advantage.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat; and wait outside in the car until theyre done. Bean gets bored, so bored that he decides to sneak into the spa and get Mrs. Wicket and Miss Wince out. Chased by the irate Receptionist, Bean gets more than he bargained for when he crashes into Mrs. Wickets massage session.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After a regrettable episode involving his landlady sleepwalking into his room, Mr. Bean suddenly finds himself out on his ear with nowhere to live. Near to tears, he yearns for the cosy familiarity of his old home. A scarecrow and a pair of false teeth come to his rescue.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: An old photo album causes Bean to reminisce about his lovely summers at scout camp as a boy, and sets him planning a night under the stars with Teddy. Purchasing a tent becomes a tricky problem – but nothing will stop him having a good time, even if he has to get the garden shed over the roof of his house.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: While on a cruise ship with Rick and Ginger, Jerry and Tuffy go explore the ships buffet and leave Spike and Tom in the room. They all meet Meathead, a vicious ship cat who will stop at nothing to terrorize the four of them.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Rick and Ginger take Tom and Spike on a road trip to Gingers aunts house where Spike is terrorized by a dog traveling in a trailer. Meanwhile, Jerry and Tuffy cause problems when they get caught in Rick and Gingers suitcase.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry Gokko
programme.desc: It’s the middle of the night and Tom plays makeshift instruments creating loud music that wakes up Jerry. Jerry tries to put an end to Toms concert with no success. Tuffy wakes up and goes along with the music. Jerry decides to join in on the fun.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Hildie and Beatie bring home a fortune-telling magic mirror. When it shows Tom a future he doesnt like, he tries everything to avoid it. In fact, everything that Tom does to avoid his future only seems to make it worse.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Spike comes to Tom and Jerry for help finding his missing bones. The detectives investigate a community garden, and it seems like their number-one suspect is an elusive gopher. It turns out that Tyke dug up all of his dads bones and was saving them as a birthday present for Spike.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Spike orders Tom and Jerry to watch Tyke while hes away, but instead Tom takes the opportunity to chase Jerry in the backyard. Suddenly, Tyke is nowhere to be seen and the front gate is wide open! Tom and Jerry must find the pup in time or face Spikes beating.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: On the edge of the village of Catsylvania, Tom is carried off to Dr. Frankensteins castle lab. Several lightning bolts later, a monster comes to life: a nine-foot-tall hulk with Toms relatively tiny head sewn on. Frankenstein orders the monster to go terrorize the village, but it has problems focusing after Toms head sees Jerry in the lab.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tom and Jerry go to a pool party at Toodless place, Tom shows off in the pool with ridiculous stunts. Butch and Meathead arrive, adding more rivalry to the party. Soon, Toodles suggests they play a game of water polo, which reaches a fever pitch before long.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Spike the bulldog comes to Tom and Jerry, complaining he is being harassed by unknown creditors, ex-girlfriends, and other problems due to identity theft. They take the case on and go in search of who could be using Spikes name. It quickly becomes equally confusing for them to sort out.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A fast-talking sales cat named Dr. Jake L. appears to Tom from a trap door in the floor, selling Ache-Eee Bones tonic. However, when the doctor sees Jerry and Tuffy, he instantly turns into the slobbering Mr. Hyde-Cat and chases them, but then changes back to the doctor. Tom wants to buy the tonic but soon finds out whats happening with the visiting cat and tries to get rid of him.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Butch breaks up with his girlfriend, Tom, Jerry, and Tuffy work to bring them back together so Butch wont go after Toodles.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry Gokko
programme.desc: It’s the middle of the night and Tom plays makeshift instruments creating loud music that wakes up Jerry. Jerry tries to put an end to Toms concert with no success. Tuffy wakes up and goes along with the music. Jerry decides to join in on the fun.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom gets a can of Cat Cop- a spray that creates a tiny cop that chases Jerry around.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When the gang find an air hockey table in the garage, its cats versus mice in an epic game of hockey!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tom and Jerry break a picture frame on the wall, Rick gives Tom an ultimatum that hes out for good if he breaks one more thing. Despite Toms earnest response, he breaks something right after Rick leaves to purchase a new frame. Attempting to fix the problem, Tom borrows tools and coveralls from a repair truck nearby but cant stop breaking things in the repair process.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Jerry pretends to be a distinguished butler to gain access to the manors pantry.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom is accidentally turned into a beast while visiting a swamp, and chases around forest animals. Jerry works to stop him.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Kept awake by Tom watching TV, Jerry goes outside and encounters some lightning bugs. The smallest one cant keep up, so Jerry steals Toms energy drink for the little guy. It helps, but soon the super-charged bug causes unexpected issues for Tom and Jerry.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders try to help Winston Whale by building him a mail truck, but Winston is used to working alone.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: When Mayor Foghorn Leghorn hires The Looney Builders to build a lighthouse for Looneyburg, Lola’s tablet breaks and she must rely on herself.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders redesign the last hole of the ACME Acres miniature golf course. Porky is determined to make it just right for the children who will play on it.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Beaver Brothers hire The Looney Builders to build them a log cabin, but soon sidetrack the job by goofing around too much.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build a skate park for the kids, but it soon interferes with Hoots Talon and his friends’ activities. / The Looney Builders face underwater challenges as they build a sea school for Moxie Manatee.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Badcomputer captures Bibi and disguises Jestah to take her place with the Batwheels so that Jestah can steal the Batcomputer’s motherboard. / When a group of alley dogs, aided by a heroic stray, are saved from Catwoman by kind-hearted Buff, he brings them all back to live in the Batcave. / Batwing and Goldie secretly decide to participate in the Gotham Air-Show. / Bam brings Catwomans Catmobile to life so the Batwheels can have even teams for their game of Bat-Ball.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After agreeing to swap motherboards and change bodies, the Batwheels have to quickly learn to “drive a mile in each other’s wheels” in time to stop the approaching Legion of Zoom!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi has some competition with Nightwing’s motorcycle, Nightbike. These stunt bikes will need to learn that they’re better when they work together. / After Nightbike reveals that hes afraid of loud noises, the Batwheels help him overcome his fear so he can stop The Penguin from strealing some valuable cargo.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Ducky and Quizz steal the Bat-Signal’s one-of-a-kind lightbulb, Bam and Batwing must find a way to restore the legendary light so Batman knows when Gotham needs him.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Kitty is staying over at the Batcave for a sleepover, but getting her to lie down for a catnap is no easy task as the Batwheels have to find creative ways to get her to sleep.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird learns a lesson in asking for permission when he takes one of Buffs stuffed animals without asking. When the stuffed animal accidentally gets swiped by the Legion of Zoom, Redbird will have to rescue the stuffed unicorn or admit to Buff what he did.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean orders a takeaway pizza but when it arrives he feels let down by the size of it. So he sets out to bake his own unique Teddy shaped pizzas. Under the name Pizza Bean his pizzas become extremely popular and very soon business in booming. As a result rival pizza producer Don Crustyoni sees his profits plummeting and decides to make Mr Bean an offer he can’t refuse.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is not allowed to fly off on holiday as his passport has no photograph. After failing to get one from a photo booth he tries numerous other ways to get his photo taken including photobombing a tourist’s snap. None of these work but after Bean is arrested maybe the police can assist him. Say cheese!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants to impress Irma by entering them both into a dance competition at the local park. But his tango is terrible and his rumba ridiculous so he enrols for lessons at a local dance school. After an unsuccessful class at the dance studio and a trip to the library to teach himself Mr Bean has lost track of time. He needs to make it up to a disgruntled Irma but will his homemade effort ‘win’ her over.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean manages to get himself locked in a department store overnight while spending too long trying on clothes. Bean takes advantage of the situation having fun in the various departments. But when he discovers a robbery taking place the fun and games stop as the desperate burglar chases Bean from floor to floor and all around the store.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wickets nephew. He decides he must have his own console, only to discover how expensive they are. But as luck would have it, he arrives at the shop at closing time to discover that tomorrow there will be a special sale. All he has to do is be first in line.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Chanterelle sees how good Lilit is at painting, she offers to help her dig into her talent.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is very excited: tonight, a rare and extremely stinky plant is going to bloom! But he already promised Mush-Mush to play their favourite game. When he chooses the flower instead, Mush-Mush is angry and the two friends stop talking. But when Mush-Mush realises that Chep is about to miss the blooming, he decides he won’t let that happen and helps his friend!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit take their compost meals back to their home-tree to eat, they think they have made a great new discovery.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit are playing dares and having a lot fun. All the Mushables are happy for them except Fung and Miff who keep mocking them.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: While they are enjoying the longest day of the summer, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit realise that the forest is drying out.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After stealing Grizzys jar of Yummy chocolate spread, the Lemmings propel the bear far from the log cabin. Grizzy lands in a temple where he finds a crystal skull which gives you the power to sow discord within a group. Grizzy uses it to set the rodents at odds amongst themselves and takes advantage of the general fight to recover the chocolate spread. But the effects of the magic skull only last a certain time and the ill-feelings cease. The Lemmings unite to give Grizzy a taste of his own medicine!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While climbing back to the cabin carrying a load of delicious berries, Grizzy trips and falls over backwards. He performs a series of acrobatics worthy of a diving champ and resurfaces safe and sound despite himself. The Lemmings, who saw everything, are in awe and treat Grizzy like an idol. Grizzy starts to enjoy this VIP treatment until the Lemmings ask him to repeat his exploit. Grizzy agrees but discovers that the Lemmings have built a giant diving board for the occasion.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings lose their jar of chocolate spread in a labyrinthian Temple. Determined to recover their favorite afternoon snack, they confront one another in the maze, but end up getting totally lost. Grizzy finds himself back at square one and decides to find something to make holes in the walls and cheat. As for the Lemmings, they discover a magic map of the place that enables you to orient yourself and modify the corridors in real time. Which cheater will win?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Things start to disappear from the log cabin as if by magic. Grizzy is persuaded that the Lemmings are the culprits, but the Lemmings are also victims of inexplicable thefts. As they argue, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the true authors of the repeated thefts: a gang of fanatic partridges who bring stolen objects as offerings to their goddess, a giant partridge. Grizzy and Lemmings join forces to infiltrate the nest and recover their belongings.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A frog swallows an ancestral jewel that bestows it with the power of mind control. Grizzy uses the frog to swallow the flies that have proliferated in the cabin, and which now let themselves be docilely caught. The Lemmings don’t miss a thing. They decide to get hold of the frog to hypnotize an uncooperative tapir who refuses to play rodeo. Grizzy hypnotizes the Lemmings, who become his servants. But several Lemmings escaped and are preparing a rescue mission.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A military convoy has an accident while transporting top-secret material. In the impact, a technological sphere flies out and rolls over to Grizzy, who was gathering berries in the forest. Grizzy realizes that the sphere is a sort of compass that indicates the direction of his desires. He follows it and finds a bush overflowing with his favorite berries. The Lemmings recover the compass to find super game sites in the forest.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a hand-shaped scepter ornated with a gold nugget that covers anything it touches with gold. Grizzy uses the object to “gold leaf” the Lemmings and swipe their chocolate bar. The Lemmings use their golden casts as armors to recover their chocolate. During the combat, the gold nugget is replaced by a chocolate one: the scepter now coats everything with chocolate. The Lemmings snatch it and flee.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize a dance contest where the first prize is a jar of chocolate spread. Grizzy is hungry and decides to participate. He partners up with a talented dancing parrot and wins. Incapable of sharing, Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the prize. The parrot brings the jar to a temple devoted to the glory of dancing parrots. To get it back, Grizzy and the Lemmings must perform a choreography. They decide to rehearse together.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a strange creature fossilized in amber resin that resembles him. A natural science encyclopedia confirms that it’s his ancestor. Grizzy wants to take the block of amber, but the Lemmings fight him for it because the blue animal with big teeth is their ancestor too. The block cracks during their fight and frees the ancestor who turns out to be a rather unmanageable burden.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a strange card game representing the elements along with instructions. The idea is to pretend that the ground is on fire or of ice, like in the game “Floor is Lava.” They transform the cabin into a giant adventure trail. Depending on the card drawn, they must avoid zones on the floor with flames or wax. Grizzy unceremoniously gets rids of the setup to regain control of the cabin. One of the cards lands on a stone slab that transforms into lava. The Lemmings are delighted: they will be able to play “for real”!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma is dragging a very bored Mr Bean around a shopping centre when he spots a competition for Minty Mints – pull your silliest face for a photo and win a cash prize! Mr Bean tries to queue but it’s too long - so he persuades Irma to visit a photo studio offering romantic photoshoots. Can Mr Bean get away with pulling funny faces and submit the photo to the Minty Mints people without Irma knowing?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Scrapper claws a rip in Teddy, Mr Bean rushes him to the Teddy hospital. As Teddy is being fixed, Mr Bean is rather taken with another Ted on sale in the shop. He decided to take Big Ted home with him once Teddy is fixed. But at home it seems as though Big Ted is freezing Teddy out, and after a particularly terrifying nightmare, Mr Bean realises he has to get rid of his new guest.

programme.desc: Today experts are investigating Alcatrazs remarkable engineering secrets. Theyre uncovering the Rocks forgotten past, protecting its concrete cells, and exploring why so many convicts tried and failed to escape the toughest jail in America.

programme.title: Blowing Up History
programme.desc: The Iceman is the worlds oldest and most perfectly preserved mummy, and brand-new cutting-edge forensic technology is revealing his darkest secrets; these discoveries could change everything we know about the humans who lived 5,000 years ago.

programme.title: How Its Made: Dream Cars
programme.desc: Picture your dream car - does it look like a Jaguar XF? The crew go to its birthplace, revealing the inner workings and stunning exterior.

programme.title: How Its Made: Dream Cars
programme.desc: Picture your dream car - does it look like a BMW M6? The crew go to its birthplace, revealing the inner workings and stunning exterior.

programme.title: How Its Made: Dream Cars
programme.desc: The crew goes to its birthplace, revealing the inner workings and stunning exterior of the Rolls-Royce Dawn, regarded by many as a dream car.

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: How do they make the king of cheeses, Parmesan? How do they keep the runways running at the worlds busiest airports? And, how do they manufacture relaxing reclining chairs?

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: A look at ways to weave an authentic Turkish carpet, and how helicopter blade technology is being used to make cross country skis. Plus, the practicalities behind the Niagara Falls.

programme.title: How the Universe Works
programme.desc: Recent discoveries could explain how supermassive black holes grow so big, one of the universes most mysterious questions. Neither dark matter nor cannibalism can fully explain these monsters, but the latest science might finally provide an answer.

programme.title: How the Universe Works
programme.desc: Life once existed on Mars, but a series of devastating mass extinctions have made present-day life nearly impossible. The latest science shows how Martian life keeps bouncing back as it transforms from a blue watery world like Earth into a desert planet.

programme.title: How the Universe Works
programme.desc: The universe holds real-life Death Stars that are capable of destroying planet Earth, and terrifying secrets of NASAs six deadliest are shown, like vampire stars, supernovas than can vaporize an entire planet, and unpredictable stars gone rogue.

programme.title: Dino Hunters
programme.desc: Clayton continues his excavation of a rare, carnivorous dinosaur on his Montana ranch. In Wyoming, Mike and Jake prepare to sell their prized T-Rex fossil.

programme.title: Richard Hammonds Big
programme.desc: Richard explores one of the worlds biggest man-made engineering projects: the Kolnbrein Dam, which can hold back an incredible 200 million tonnes of water!

programme.title: How Its Made: Dream Cars
programme.desc: The crew head to the birthplace of the Morgan 3-Wheeler in England where the cars inner workings and gorgeous exterior are examined.

programme.title: How Its Made: Dream Cars
programme.desc: Ginetta and Team LNT are synonymous with racing, making headway in auto racing history for decades. The crew head to its birthplace, revealing the inner workings.

programme.title: How Its Made: Dream Cars
programme.desc: Ever wondered how a Lucra LC470 is made? Join the How Its Made crew as they go to its birthplace, explore the inner workings and its gorgeous exterior.

programme.title: How Its Made: Dream Cars
programme.desc: The Chevrolet Corvette Stingray is a fast and lightweight update on an automobile legend from the 1960s. How is this impressive vehicle constructed?

programme.title: How Its Made: Dream Cars
programme.desc: Heavily inspired by superbike designs, the Ktm X-Bow is always road and race ready. What elements come together to create this powerful and innovative vehicle?

programme.title: How Its Made: Dream Cars
programme.desc: The Tesla Model S is a high-performance and high-speed vehicle with zero emissions. What goes into the construction of this innovative electric car?

programme.title: Blowing Up History
programme.desc: The infamous gunfight at the O.K. Corral only lasted 30 seconds. Now, experts use cutting-edge technology to uncover the mystery surrounding the event.

programme.title: Blowing Up History
programme.desc: The Tower of Babel is one of the most famous stories of the Bible. Archaeologists use new technology to uncover how engineers could have built it.

programme.title: NASAs Unexplained Files

programme.title: NASAs Unexplained Files

programme.title: NASAs Unexplained Files

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: How do they make one of the worlds fastest bikes? How do pilots train for death-defying acrobatics? And, how do they bring oil and gas up from the bottom of the sea?

programme.title: How Do They Do It?

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: How do they collect the trash in road-free Venice? How do they make Australias famous sheepskin boots? And, how do they turn pond algae into a health supplement?

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: Examining how rosebuds are turned into Turkish delight, and how sunscreen is made to block out harmful UV light. Plus, how to hammer out a silver spoon.

programme.title: How Do They Do It?

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb tahtovat ottaa kesaloman jokaisesta paivasta kaiken irti! Joka paiva he keksivat uusia jannittavia jekkuja ja heidan kateellinen isosiskonsa Candace yrittaa kannella pojista aidille. Kyseessa saattaa olla vuoristoradan rakentaminen takapihalle, surffaaminen esikaupungin hyokyaalloissa tai matkustaminen ajassa taaksepain. Perheen lemmikki, Nokkaelain Perry, elaa kaksoiselamaa salaisena agenttina ja on joka jaksossa napit vastakkain ilkean Tohtori Tollontyon kanssa.

programme.desc: Tyohonsa tyytymaton kuriiri Paul vie paketteja ympari kaupunkia samaan aikaan kun Finias ja Ferb rakentavat radan, joka sisaltaa kaikki huvipuiston laitteet ja tohtori Tollontyo yrittaa tuhota kaupungintalon Mehunaattorillaan. programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Äiti tekee neulontakoetta internetissa ja kaikkien pitaa olla mahdollisimman hiljaa, joten Finias ja Ferb kehittavat ninja-asuja, jotka katkevat kayttajansa kaikilta paitsi toisilta ninjoilta. Silla valin Tollontyosta tulee komea ja suosittu. / Baljeet saa viimeinkin tarpeekseen Bufordista ja paattaa kiiveta Danvillen vuoren huipulle... ilman keksintojen apua – Finiaksen ja Ferbin jarkytykseksi. Silla valin Buford ryhtyy tohtori Tollontyon katyriksi, mutta kaipaa sisimmassaan ”omaa norttiaan”.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb matkaavat Druselsteiniin, dunkelmarjojen kotimaahan, ja paatyvat sovittelijoiksi vuohien kulkusuuntaa koskevassa kriisissa. Silla valin Perry auttaa tohtori Tollontyota uusimaan ajokorttinsa ja Candace yrittaa selvittaa poikien katoavien keksintojen mysteeria tieteen keinoin. / Buford pukeutuu karhuksi auttaakseen ranskalaisia partiotyttoja hankkimaan ansiomerkin. Tilanne muuttuu monimutkaisemmaksi, kun kay ilmi, etta ollessaan Pariisissa Buford seurusteli yhden tytoista kanssa. Silla valin Perry yrittaa estaa tohtori Tollontyota pilaamasta Danvillen rinkeliviikkoja.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb tahtovat ottaa kesaloman jokaisesta paivasta kaiken irti! Joka paiva he keksivat uusia jannittavia jekkuja ja heidan kateellinen isosiskonsa Candace yrittaa kannella pojista aidille. Kyseessa saattaa olla vuoristoradan rakentaminen takapihalle, surffaaminen esikaupungin hyokyaalloissa tai matkustaminen ajassa taaksepain. Perheen lemmikki, Nokkaelain Perry, elaa kaksoiselamaa salaisena agenttina ja on joka jaksossa napit vastakkain ilkean Tohtori Tollontyon kanssa.

programme.title: Terevisioon
programme.desc: „Terevisioonis on koos uudised, ilmateade, olulised jutuajamised ja mõnusad kulalised. Saravad saatejuhid Katrin Viirpalu, Martha-Beryl Grauberg, Juhan Kilumets ja Reimo Sildvee annavad endast parima, et kõik teie paevad algaksid energiliselt ning hasti. Režissoorid Elo Selirand ja Johanna Maria Vilgats, produtsent Rait Roland Veskemaa

programme.title: Terevisioon
programme.desc: „Terevisioonis on koos uudised, ilmateade, olulised jutuajamised ja mõnusad kulalised. Saravad saatejuhid Katrin Viirpalu, Martha-Beryl Grauberg, Juhan Kilumets ja Reimo Sildvee annavad endast parima, et kõik teie paevad algaksid energiliselt ning hasti. Režissoorid Elo Selirand ja Johanna Maria Vilgats, produtsent Rait Roland Veskemaa

programme.title: Maahommik
programme.desc: Maahommik randab mooda Eestimaad ringi ja kohtub erinevate inimeste ja nende põnevate tegemistega. Teie ees rullub lahti maaelu varvipalett koos kõikide oma varjunditega. Loomad, taimed, talud, tood ja musttuhat muud lugu ootab teid just Maahommiku saates. Saatejuht on Kerli Dello. Vastutav toimetaja Maili Metssalu, režissoorid Mikk Mae ja Mati Kark, produtsent Tiina-Mari Koljak.

programme.title: Osoon
programme.desc: Ida-Virumaal on tehismagedesse kuhjatud enam kui miljard tonni põlevkivitoostuse jaatmeid, mis peidavad endas potentsiaalselt vaartuslikku toorainet erinevatele toostusharudele. Millised võiks olla nende kasutusvõimalused? Tõsine uleilmne probleem on ka tekstiilijaatmete rohkus, mille ringlussevõtu võimalused on kesised. Kasutatud ja katkised tekstiilid jõuavad sageli arengumaadesse, kus koormavad kogukondi ning põhjustavad keskkonnareostust. Uurime Keenias, millist koostood teevad eestlased kohalikega, et tekstiiljaatmete probleemile leevendust tuua. Saate autorid on Kristo Elias ja Sander Loite, toimetaja Marit Valk, režissoor Keiti Valiste, produtsent Heiki Sepp.

programme.title: Elu lugu
programme.desc: Sibula Ärni on mees, kes oskab peitliga maalida. Mis on puutoos oluline ja kuidas uks õige nõialuud valmis teha, seda kusib Aivi Parijõgi, režissoor Mati Kark.

programme.title: La Promesa
programme.desc: Abel on Janale uha rohkem toeks. Leonor vihastab Martina ja Curro peale. María olukord on aina troostitum. Feliciano soovitab Petral markiisile tõtt tunnistada.

programme.title: Syke
programme.desc: Mikko tuleb teadvusele ja palub, et vanemad ei lahutaks. Sonja on sunnitud langetama raske otsuse. Aino muudab Kaiuse osas meelt. Johanna on oma esitlusest elevil, kuid Ira võtab kogu au selle eest endale.

programme.title: Estraadisangarid
programme.desc: Eesti tuntud ja tunnustatud hitimeistreid Kustas Kikerpuud ja Uno Naissood uhendas suur armastus džassmuusika vastu ning aastakumnete pikkune panus meie muusikaõpetusse. Kui Naissood peetakse Eesti džassi isaks, siis Kikerpuud võib nimetada Maarjamaa esimeseks muusikaprodutsendiks. Just Kikerpuu loodud „Horoskoop” on olnud uks kõigi aegade vaadatuim telesaade Eestis. Dokumentaalsarja viimane osa jalgib kahe Eesti muusika suurkuju elu ja loometeed labi igihaljate viiside kuni moodsate arranžeeringuteni valja. Autorid Roald Johannson ja Jaak Kilmi.

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: Louisale tuleb ootamatult kulla isa, kes peaks vanglas istuma. Selgub, et Terry on suremas ja vabastati tingimisi, kuid Martin hakkab diagnoosis kahtlema. Ruth teeb Martinile veriseid ullatusi. Bertilt tahetakse haagis ara osta, kuid selles elab noormees, keda ei saa valja visata.

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Vernon haarab kohaliku puhkpilliorkestri juhtimise enda katte. Ta veenab lord Ashfordlyt palkama orkestri Ameerika sõjaveteranidele esinema, orkestri dirigent aga ei salli ameeriklasi. Kohalik autovaras paaseb vanglast ja satub juhuslikult relvastatud roovi osaliseks.

programme.title: Üks koorilaul
programme.desc: Heino Kaljuste laulu Tutre tanu esitab tutarlastekoor Canzone, teksti raagib koorijuht Tiia-Ester Loitme. Dirigent Ulrika Grauberg. Tana on Heino Kaljuste 100. sunniaastapaev.

programme.title: Õnne 13
programme.desc: Alma kohtab tanaval juhuslikult Pillet ja kutsub ta enda juurde kohvile. Johannes tahab paasta olukorda, et Alma Pillele liiga palju ei lobiseks. Are hoiatab Mailist Põdra eest. Ruudi, Felix ja Alexander uritavad lahendada tekkinud korteriprobleemi. Teet Kallase dokumentaaldraama, idee autor Astrid Reinla.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Syke
programme.desc: Haiglasse tuuakse vahihaige Anu, kes loodab saada terveks tanu positiivsele mõtlemisele. Teda ravides tekib Santeri ja Leevi vahel lahem suhe. Üksildane Jari kannatab unetuse all ja võtab unerohtu vahetult enne seda, kui ta kutsutakse erakorralisele opile. Patsiendil tekib lõikusel eluohtlik olukord.

programme.title: Impulss

programme.title: Õnne 13
programme.desc: Maria ja Henry uurivad Tiinalt ratsepaameti kohta. Alma keelab Haraldil Lainet kosida. Mare kulastab Jaanust. Annelit huvitab Are korter.

programme.title: Eesti mang
programme.desc: Sel nadalal astuvad Eesti mangus võistlustulle leiutaja ja Energia avastuskeskuse hing Aare Baumer, Vabamu juht Ivo Lille ning ERMi juht Laura Kipper. Kusimusi esitab ja saadet juhib Gaute Kivistik.

programme.title: Elu lugu
programme.desc: Pitsi kudumiseks peab olema palju kannatust ja kuna seda on peetud ikka naiste tooks, siis on vaja olla julge poiss, et hakata pitsi kuduma. Vanaema kõrval hakkas Riho Toomrat juba poisikesena pits ja selle tegemine huvitama ja nuud võib meister valja panna uhke naituse. Juttu ajas Aivi Parijõgi.

programme.title: La Promesa
programme.desc: Petra eitab, et Feliciano on ta poeg. Markiis ulatab Pelayole abikae. Jana taipab, et María peidukoht võib olla nõgeste lahedal. Martina kurvastab Leonori kaitumise parast.

programme.title: Syke
programme.desc: Haiglasse tuuakse vahihaige Anu, kes loodab saada terveks tanu positiivsele mõtlemisele. Teda ravides tekib Santeri ja Leevi vahel lahem suhe. Üksildane Jari kannatab unetuse all ja võtab unerohtu vahetult enne seda, kui ta kutsutakse erakorralisele opile. Patsiendil tekib lõikusel eluohtlik olukord.

programme.title: Maailm ja mõnda
programme.desc: Valdur Mikita jagab Laoses Luang Prabangi linnas, hommikul kell 5.30, buda munkadele riisi. See on uks hingepuhastav rituaal. Toidu jagamine on ju samuti uks palvetamise vorme. Olemise ilu - selline võiks olla uks Laose marksõnu. Laoses veedetud aeg on nagu pikk meditatsioon, mille kaigus muutud ka ise paremaks inimeseks. Osalesime ka veel baci tseremoonial. Laose kuningapaleest lahkus kuningas alles 1975. aastal, kuid palee endine hiilgus on alles. Ou Paki koopasse on palverandurid viinud ule 1000 buda kuju. Sinna saab ainult paadiga mooda Mekongi jõge ja see sõit on omaette elamus. Kõige kõrgemasse koopasse jõudmiseks tuleb ronida ules kolmesajast trepiastmest, kuid see tasub ennast ara. Laoses filmisid Valdur Mikita, Tiina Park ja Marianne Kõrver. Saate tootis Free Studio.

programme.title: Madat omenat
programme.desc: Onerva puuab Vera perekonnale teada anda, et viimane on teistest eraldatud ja uimastatud. Lundsteni saadab tema uurimistoos edu, kui tal õnnestub manipuleerida Serafina malestustega.

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Politseijaoskond on šokis Tomi vagivaldse surma parast. Mertonit suudistatakse kotiroovis. Kui Bernie teist noorust naudib, peab Vernon uksi taksoari ajama.

programme.title: Õnne 13
programme.desc: Ivanil tekib nii Kristjani kui ka Lainega vaga hea klapp. Margna ja Põder kavatsevad linnapea vastu vandenõud alustada. Margna kulastab Jaanust. Teet Kallase dokumentaaldraama, idee autor Astrid Reinla.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Syke
programme.desc: Pekkale leitakse viimasel hetkel õige ravim. Lenita kinnitab Jarmole, et ta ei taha enam temaga suhelda ja vihane Jarmo naitab taas oma tõelist palet. Anu keeldub operatsioonist. Leevi ja Santeri viivad Pekka koera loomade hotelli.

programme.title: La Promesa
programme.desc: Lope aitab hadas neidu. Curro otsustab tiitlist loobuda. Catalina noomib Margaritat ja Lorenzot. Pía uritab Petrat aidata.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Ringvaade
programme.desc: Ringvaade toob vaatajate ette Eesti elu kirevaimad tegelased ja suurimad seiklused. Saatejuhid Grete Lõbu ja Marko Reikop.

programme.title: Tahelepanu! Tegemist on teadusega
programme.desc: Eesti teadlased teevad iga paev avastusi, mis aitavad muuta meie tulevikku targemaks, turvalisemaks ja põnevamaks. Klipisari viib vaataja laboritesse ja katsevaljakutele, kus sunnivad ullatuslikud ideed ning avanevad teadusmaailma salaparased telgitagused. Režissoor Maarika Lauri, toimetaja Marit Ummelas.

programme.title: Pealtnagija
programme.desc: Kaheosaline dokumentaal, mis jutustab, kuidas nõukogude ajal Eesti NSV naiste murdmaakoondise juures alustanud usinast ja uuenduslikust eesti treenerist sai rahvusvahelise murdmaasuusatamise uks mõjukam ning tuntum spetsialist, kes tõstis sportlasi olumpiapjedestaalidele, aga havitas ka karjaare. Ta palvis tunnustust, auhindu ja kiitust, aga pettis samal ajal keeruliste kombinatsioonidega dopingukontrolle, sponsoreid ning spordisõpru. Mati Alaver - valgusest varju on traagiline lugu poorasest vaimustusest ja rangast pettumusest, mille telgitagustes peitub palju pooltoone ning fakte, mida uldsus esimest korda kuuleb. Autor-stsenarist Mihkel Karmas, režissoorid Raivo Maripuu, Vladlen Pobjaržin, toimetajad Kristjan Pihl, Taavi Eilat, Merilin Parli, Uljana Kuzmina, produtsent Piret Priisaar.

programme.title: Kultuuri kodu
programme.desc: Kultuuri kodu on koht kõigile Eesti kirjanikele, muusikutele, kunstnikele, arhitektidele, disaineritele, teatri- ja filmiinimestele. See on ruumikas pesapaik, kuhu mahuvad kõik kenasti ara ja head kultuuri pole ju kunagi liiga palju. Eesti Kultuurkapitali sajanda juubeli puhul koputame kultuuri kodu uksele ja vaatame, kes neist meie aega ja ruumi kujundavatest loojatest parajasti kodus juhtub olema. Luhiportreede sarja režissoor on Erle Veber, tekste kirjutab Urmas Vadi ja loeb Marika Vaarik, arhiivis toimetab Ruth Alakula, kaamerat juhib Manuel Magi ning mikrofoni hoiab Mart Kessel-Otsa.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera. Ilm
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Sport
programme.desc: Spordiuudised

programme.title: Esimene stuudio
programme.desc: Saatesari avab erinevaid paevakajalisi teemasid, mis sunnivad meie igapaeva-elust, alates poliitikast ja majandusest, lõpetades sotsiaalia ning kultuuriga. Saatejuhid Andres Kuusk, Johannes Tralla, Mirko Ojakivi. Režissoor Maarika Lauri, produtsent Tiina-Mari Koljak.

programme.title: Kirjandusministri juures. Muusika eri
programme.desc: Raamatuaasta puhul võõrustab kirjandusminister Mart Juur Eesti raamat 500 patrooni, president Alar Karist. Kord kuus raagime presidendi jaoks olulistest teostest. Tana kasitleme koos presidendi ja kulalistega Jaan Aru raamatut Ajust ja arust. Unest, teadvusest, tehisintellektist ja muust.

programme.title: Tõnis Magi. Vaikus valguses
programme.desc: Portreefilm Eesti muusika elavast legendist. Saranud aastakumneid mitte ainult kodumaa, vaid kogu kunagise Nõukogude Liidu rokitaevas, sai temast taasiseseisvumisaja suurim ja Eesti rahvast kõige jõulisemalt uhendav laulik. Labi varvika elu keerdkaikude on Tõnis jõudnud aarmiselt põneva maailmatunnetuseni, millest on kantud ka tema looming. Film annab vaatajale võimaluse õige lahedalt piiluda helilooja salaparasesse maailma ja olla kaasreisijaks teekonnal, mis muusikut inspireerib. Režissoor Priit Paasuke.

programme.title: Pea ees vette. Tai Kuningriigis
programme.desc: Seekordses osas teevad Milderid pai Tai rahvusloomale elevandile. Uuritakse lahemalt nende majesteetlike hiiglaste kaekaigu kohta tanases Tai Kuningriigis, kus võib kuulda rohkelt lugusid elevantide vaarkohtlemisest. Lisaks lastakse hea maitsta Tai magustoitudel ning kulastatakse templit, kus kaiakse Buda kaest rikkust ja lotoõnne palumas. Toimetaja Piret Jarvis-Milder, režissoor Egert Milder.

programme.title: Aavedata-elokuva
programme.desc: Varusmies Milla Arosen katoaminen on yksi suomen tunnetuimmista katoamistapauksista. Nainen katosi kesalla 2019 Somerolla viettaessaan vapaata viikonloppua armeijasta. Erikoiseksi taman tekee se, etta murhaaja on tunnustanut teon ja istuu talla hetkella siita vankilassa. Valitettavasti han ei paljastanut ruumiin oikeaa katkopaikkaa, joka sai meidat kiinnostumaan tapauksesta entistakin enemman.

programme.title: Autohullut
programme.desc: K2 J2 Arttu Harkin ja stunttimestari Crazy Miken alias Mauri Uuskosken tahdittama kotimainen sarja, jossa testataan autojen myyntipuheiden paikkansapitavyytta. Jaksoissa vuorottelevat asiapitoinen autojen testaus ja stunttileikittely tahtivieraiden kanssa.

programme.title: Remppaa ja Sisusta
programme.desc: K1 J6 Jaksossa markatila levytetaan ja seinat villoitetaan. Vanha valiseina puretaan ja tilalle rakennetaan kantava runko sisaan liukuvalle ovelle. Kattoa nostetaan pullotunkin avulla, jotta rakenteet saadaan suoraan.

programme.title: Kansallispuistot tutuiksi

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.desc: Four Southwestern chefs take the reins as they face cooking with cactus and casserole, spicy surprises and a special flour.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman

programme.desc: Kausi 10. Jakso 3/11. Sauna kallellaan. Jakson perhetta ahdistaa saunamokki, joka on ihastuttavasti jarven rannalla, mutta uhkaavasti kallellaan. programme.desc: Tokmannin logistiikkakeskuksen halki mutkittelee rata, jolle kilpailijat rakentavat omat radio-ohjattavat rekka-autonsa. Kuka kuskaa lopulta eniten palikoita?

programme.title: Maryn helpot kokkailut
programme.desc: Kausi 1. Jakso 1/25. Kanaa neljalla tavalla. Mary esittelee nelja niin helppoa kanareseptia, ettei huonoimmallakaan kokilla mene sormi suuhun. Han valmistaa mehevan kokonaisen kanan, lohduttavaa kananuudelikeittoa ja mausteista kanawokkia. Jopa parmesaanikana valmistuu helposti ja ilman hassakkaa. Kanadalainen ruokareality.

programme.title: Korkeasaari
programme.desc: Korkeasaaren myskilauma on kasvanut sitten viime kauden, silla sinne on tullut jalkikasvua kaksin kappalein. Uusi tulokas saaressa on myos urosleijona Szimba. Jaksossa nahdaan Tristan-saukon kesaasunto ja tehdaan pikkumangusteille virikkeita Roni Backin kanssa, jonka pitaa paasta yli otokkakammostaan.

programme.title: Burgerimiehet Valimerella
programme.desc: Akselin ja Ossin Valimeren seikkailu huipentuu hurjaan kebab-takaa-ajoon Bosporinsalmen rannalla Turkissa. Energiaa saadaan baklavasta ja kaikki muu basaarista. Sarja paattyy.

programme.title: Petolliset
programme.desc: Kausi 1. Jakso 2/8. Muistoasi kunnioittaen. Yon aikana yksi kilpailijoista on murhattu. Hanen muistolleen on jarjestetty muistotilaisuus, jonka aikana on mahdollisuus loytaa hopeaharkkoja. Uskolliset yrittavat paasta petollisten jaljille, ja pyoreasta poydasta karkotetaan ensimmainen kilpailija. Kotimainen realitysarja.

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Kausi 14. Jakso 5/18. Uskonpuute. Ammattiliittopomo haluaa poliisit mukaan liittoonsa. Danny pyytaa vanhan tutun apua Pikku-Vietnamissa. Erin hoitaa hevoskuolemiin liittyvaa juttua liittovaltion puolesta. Amerikkalainen draamasarja.

programme.title: Alaskan jaalentokentta
programme.desc: Pienkone toimii huoltotiimina pitkassa moottorikelkkakisassa. Merkkivalojen puhdistus Fairbanksin lentokentalla on rankkaa kasityota. Suihkumoottorin huolto tuottaa Alaska Airlinesin mekaanikoille ikavan yllatyksen.

programme.title: Arman Pohjantahden alla
programme.desc: Kuinka paljon aikaa ja rahaa kaytamme ulkonakoon, tai kuinka pitkalle olemme valmiita menemaan muiden hyvaksynnan ja ihailun eteen? Illan dokumentissa Arman pohtii yhteiskunnan seka median luomia kauneusihanteita ja niiden vaikutusta minakuvaamme.

programme.title: Paratiisihotelli Tanska
programme.desc: Kausi 17. Jakso 7/39. Viidakkokaksintaistelu. Kaksi asukasta on viidakkokaksintaistelussa. Voittaja saa lukituksen ja salaista valtaa. Illalla on apinabileet. Nukkumisjarjestelyt aiheuttavat riemua ja jankkaamista. Tanskalainen sarja.

programme.title: Paratiisihotelli Tanska
programme.desc: Kausi 17. Jakso 8/39. Kaarmeseremonia. Yksi hotellin asukas on valittu ovelaksi kaarmeeksi, joka saa kohtalokkaan tehtavan. Hotelli on taynna vainoharhaisia asukkaita. Kaarmeseremonian jalkeen kaydaan tiukkoja keskusteluja. Tanskalainen sarja.

programme.title: Huvila And Huussi
programme.desc: Jakson perhetta ahdistaa saunamokki, joka on ihastuttavasti jarven rannalla, mutta uhkaavasti kallellaan. Mokin suoristamisen lisaksi haasteena on toteuttaa Tinnan toive rantahuvilamaisesta tunnelmasta. Kylassa osiossa Eva kay tutustumassa 7. kaudella remontoituun pihaan. Eva tuo mukanaan puutarhurinsa, jotta pihan kasvit saadaan kuntoon.

programme.title: Lego Masters Suomi
programme.desc: Aleksanterin teatterin lavalla nahdaan draamaa. Kilpailijat jaetaan kahteen joukkueeseen. Ketka lahtevat kotimatkalle, kun edessa on kohtalokas kaksintaistelu?

programme.title: Maryn helpot kokkailut
programme.desc: Kausi 1. Jakso 2/25. Treffi-illan ruokia. Mary esittelee helppoja ruokia treffi-iltoja varten. Jos haluat tehda rakkaallesi nopeaa pihviruokaa burgundinpadan tyyliin, sienimaista pestopastaa tai vaikka ihanaa pavlovaa jalkkariksi, Mary auttaa. Treffi-illan kokkailu ei ole koskaan ollut nain helppoa! Kanadalainen ruokareality.

programme.title: Korkeasaari
programme.desc: Aavikkoketut saavat uusia virikkeita, joista osa on karkuun juoksevassa muodossa. Kameliuros Abulle tehdaan koulutussuunnitelma tulevaa verikoetta varten ja katsotaan, oppiiko vanha kameli uusia temppuja. Lisaksi tutustutaan uuteen nuorten metsapeurahirvaiden laumaan, jossa toisista otetaan mittaa sarvia kalistelemalla.

programme.title: Savotta
programme.desc: UUSI SARJ ALKAA! Avausjaksossa Antti Ruuskanen vierailee lapsuudenmaisemissaan Keiteleen Puutorilla ja Tero Pitkamaki jarjestaa lentolannoitusnaytosta Vierumaella. Millaisia haasteita Tero kohtaa lannoitteen kanssa? Miten Riitta parjaa saaskia kuhisevalla savotalla, ja onnistuuko Annastiina hieromaan puukauppaa Sepon kanssa? Lahde mukaan suomalaisen metsan siimekseen!

programme.title: Petolliset
programme.desc: Kilpailijoiden rivit harvenevat, tunnelma tihenee ja ryhmapaine kasvaa. Paivan tehtavassa testataan kilpailijoiden muistia eika sekaannuksilta valtyta. Syytoksia ja epailyja esitetaan pienissa porukoissa ja lopulta pyoreassa poydassa, jossa tunnelma on kaikkea muuta kuin lempea.

programme.title: Tulossa: Immun ilmestyskirja (7)
programme.desc: Tulossa Nelonen Median kanavilla. Kotimainen ohjelma.

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Kausi 14. Jakso 6/18. Varjoissa. Danny ja Baez tutkivat lapsen katoamista, johon liittyy merkkeja voodoosta. Eddien tyokaveri epailee huippukoulun syrjivan osaa hakijoista. Garrett vetaa Frankin mukaan epamukavaan tilanteeseen. Amerikkalainen draamasarja.

programme.title: Alaskan jaalentokentta
programme.desc: Kausi 4. Jakso 6/10. Jaasoturit. Lumenauraustiimi paiskii toita Eielsonin lentotukikohdassa, NOAA:n tutkijat lentavat hurrikaaniin, helikopterilupakirjaa tavoitteleva Laura kamppailee tuulessa ja Everts Airin uusi lentokone lennetaan Englannista Alaskaan. Amerikkalainen realitysarja.

programme.title: Arman Pohjantahden alla
programme.desc: Illan jaksossa liikutaan saunan lauteilta viinibaariin ja yokerhon tanssilattialta vappupiknikille, kun Arman selvittaa suomalaisten suhdetta alkoholiin. Miten monta rohkaisuryyppya tarvitaan ja milloin kalsarikannit muuttuvat alkoholiongelmaksi? Miksi Suomessa ihannoidaan humalaa mutta demonisoidaan alkoholia?

programme.title: Paratiisihotelli Tanska
programme.desc: Kausi 17. Jakso 9/39. Myyra. Kahdella tytolla on keskenaan biiffia. Hotellin kellarissa lymyilee agentti, joka varvaa apurikseen myyran. Taman taytyy auttaa agenttia illan bileiden aikana, joten myyra ja autuaan tietamaton asukas paattavat vetaa illalla hauskoja peleja. Tanskalainen sarja.

programme.title: Paratiisihotelli Tanska
programme.desc: Kausi 17. Jakso 10/39. Identiteettivarkaus. Agentti varastaa yhden asukkaan identiteetin, mika jarkyttaa asukkaita illan bileissa. Agentti paljastaa itsensa seuraavana paivana. Yksi pojista on kahden naisen valissa. Altaalle ilmestyy mystinen puhelin. Tanskalainen sarja.

programme.title: Barnets hjarta
programme.desc: Kanslor. Bibeln talar om att kontrollera sina kanslor och vikten av kanslor i var och ens liv.

programme.title: En hjord, en herde
programme.desc: Uppenbarelsebokens tre korer. Vi ser lite narmare på korerna i Uppenbarelseboken. Vilka ar kormedlemmarna i dessa olika korer? Benjamin Turkia undervisar.

programme.title: Salaam Aleikum
programme.desc: Bon. Vad ar Guds syn på bon? Bonens betydelse diskuteras av fore detta muslimen Yasser Andraus och den messianske rabbinen Jason Sobel.

programme.title: Tillsammans ber vi LIVE
programme.desc: Fri-modig-het. Vi skams inte for evangeliet. Låt oss frimodigt stå upp for Jesus och proklamera allt han har gjort for oss. Vi ber for dina behov. Med Thomas Lennartsson, Per Azrang och Joakim Bergman

programme.title: TV7 Israelnyheter
programme.desc: TV7 Israelnyheter

programme.title: Kungen kommer
programme.desc: Josef - upphojd broder. Josef forespeglar Messias liv, dod och uppståndelse, men aven hur han uppenbaras for sina broder judarna i andens svåra tider. Daniela Persin samtalar med Martin Persin och Emanuel Zethson. 4 Mos 27.

programme.title: Pilgrim Media
programme.desc: Ett i ordet och anden | Pingstkonferens 2025. Per-Arne Imsen - Predikar. År 2025 firas det ekumeniska året, som markerar 100-årsjubileet av det stora ekumeniska motet i Stockholm 1925. Det ar dock inte alla kristna som vill vara med i detta.

programme.title: Israels berg
programme.desc: Samarien vaknar igen. Under boneresan till Jakobs brunn i Nablus tackar vi Gud for den forsta vackelsen i Samarien. Vi tackar också for att Jesus fullbordar det verk Han påborjat dar.

programme.title: Pawson
programme.desc: Guds natur: Sanningen om nåden. David Pawson undervisar i Singapore år 2013 om ratt och fel uppfattning om nåden.

programme.title: Trons grunder med Åke Carlson
programme.desc: Vad ar egentligen tro?. Tro ar tillit, att fortrosta på Gud, att Han vill hjalpa dig personligen. Trons lydnad ar att våga lita på Honom. Genom namnet Jesus har du tillgång till alla Guds egenskaper. Åke Carlson undervisar.

programme.title: Homes of Hope - aktiva kristna hem
programme.desc: Skapa naturliga rytmer av tillbedjan i hemmet. Ofta delar vi kanske upp livet i kyrkligt och vardagligt. Men egentligen ar hela vår vardag en kontinuerlig gudstjanst - på arbetet, i hemmet, i affaren, i idrottshallen. Charles Kridiotis undervisar.

programme.title: Fika i Uppsala
programme.desc: Britt gav Gud rodret i sitt liv. Britt motte Jesus och blev kallad att jobba for Honom, vilket har lett till många markliga moten och handelser. Hor vad som kan handa nar man ger Gud rodret i ens liv. Victoria Zachrisson intervjuar.

programme.title: Valsignelse, forbannelse eller slump? -studieserie
programme.desc: 5/13. Filisteerna. Filisteerna, ett krigiskt folk på Bibelns tid, bekampade ihardigt Guds utvalda folk Israel. I dag finns i stort sett inga spår kvar av deras existens. Är detta en slump, eller kan Gud ligga bakom?

programme.title: Cafe Bibeln Uppsala
programme.desc: Dodshjalp - ett farligt alternativ. Vad hander nar det blir lagligt att avsluta en manniskas liv; var dras gransen for nar det or okej och hur ska man se till att den gransen inte tanjs ut? Leif Nummela samtalar med Brita Storlund.

programme.title: TV7 Israelnyheter
programme.desc: TV7 Israelnyheter

programme.title: Jerusalemnytt med Sartola
programme.desc: Kort nyhetsoversikt varje vecka om Israel. Baserad på olika medier, bl a Jerusalem Post, Ynet News, Haaretz, Gulf News och European Jewish Press.

programme.title: Judiskt perspektiv på tro och liv
programme.desc: Gudstjanstlivet och synagogan. Det judiska gudstjanstlivet har flyttats från templet till synagogan. Hur ser det ut idag? Bengt Mosesson berattar om bonebokens centrala roll och kantorn Yuval Hed sjunger ur en torahrulle.

programme.title: Att leda en forsamling
programme.desc: Andliga barn. Vår kallelse som forsamlingar ar att få och resa upp andliga barn; manniskor som kommit till tro genom oss eller som kanske kommit till tro någon annanstans, men som tas hand om och reses upp av oss.

programme.title: Guldkorn - Tillsammans ber vi
programme.desc: Den troendes tjanst. Andre Andersson - ur Tillsammans ber vi LIVE avsnitt 88. Gud vill anvanda helt vanliga troende for sina syften i dag. Om vi ar lyhorda och villiga kan Han anvanda oss, aven om vi tvekar och famlar.

programme.title: Vagen till frihet och helande
programme.desc: Ockultismens inverkan. Ockultism finns t.ex. i olika religioner, spiritism, yoga och alternativmedicin. Demonerna bakom dem kan stalla till stor emotionell, kroppslig och ekonomisk skada, men Gud befriar.

programme.title: Pawson
programme.desc: Guds natur: Sanningen om nåden. David Pawson undervisar i Singapore år 2013 om ratt och fel uppfattning om nåden.

programme.title: Judiskt perspektiv på tro och liv
programme.desc: Gudstjanstlivet och synagogan. Det judiska gudstjanstlivet har flyttats från templet till synagogan. Hur ser det ut idag? Bengt Mosesson berattar om bonebokens centrala roll och kantorn Yuval Hed sjunger ur en torahrulle.

programme.title: Att leda en forsamling
programme.desc: Andliga barn. Vår kallelse som forsamlingar ar att få och resa upp andliga barn; manniskor som kommit till tro genom oss eller som kanske kommit till tro någon annanstans, men som tas hand om och reses upp av oss.

programme.title: Guldkorn - Tillsammans ber vi
programme.desc: Den troendes tjanst. Andre Andersson - ur Tillsammans ber vi LIVE avsnitt 88. Gud vill anvanda helt vanliga troende for sina syften i dag. Om vi ar lyhorda och villiga kan Han anvanda oss, aven om vi tvekar och famlar.

programme.title: Vagen till frihet och helande
programme.desc: Ockultismens inverkan. Ockultism finns t.ex. i olika religioner, spiritism, yoga och alternativmedicin. Demonerna bakom dem kan stalla till stor emotionell, kroppslig och ekonomisk skada, men Gud befriar.

programme.title: Re-Formation
programme.desc: Religion som hinder for genombrott. Bengt Wedemalm forkunnar.

programme.title: Israel Art
programme.desc: Daniel Carmel – kapten på Herrens skuta. Israelfodde judiske båtkaptenen på Galileiska sjon, Daniel Carmel, leder sina passagerare i lovsång.

programme.title: Trofast till slutet
programme.desc: Undvik villfarelse. Jesus varnar forsamlingen for falska larare och profeter som bedrar de troende. Andrew Brunson undervisar om två viktiga steg for att skydda oss mot detta verkliga och aktuella hot.

programme.title: Jag motte Messias
programme.desc: Jonathan Cahns avtal med Gud. Då judiske Jonathan Cahn fick en livsavgorande uppenbarelse om Jesus slot han ett avtal med Gud - och nastan dog på kuppen! Hor hur han forvandlades från ateistisk jude till messiansk judisk rabbin.

programme.title: Nya Testamentet oppnas
programme.desc: Breven till Timoteus och Titus 2/2 – Utsanda till lokalforsamlingar. Paulus sande Timoteus till Efesus och Titus till Kreta. Uppdragen var olika. Timoteus skulle ingripa i ledarskapets forehavanden och Titus utse ledare och utveckla forsamlingsmedlemmarna.

programme.title: Rakt på sak med Ingemar Helmner
programme.desc: Atmosfar som beror. For att nå icke kyrkvana behover vi utforma gudstjansterna på ett lampligt satt. Men det viktigaste ar atmosfaren. Om den ar innerlig och praglas av Guds narvaro, så kan Gud tala till vilsna hjartan.

programme.title: Antisemitismen: Från ursprung till nutid
programme.desc: Den nazistiska ideologins allmanna principer. Doktor David Silberklang och professor Dan Michman diskuterar den nazistiska ideologins allmanna principer samt vilken plats antisemitismen har bland dessa.

programme.title: Bibelstudie med Baruch Korman
programme.desc: Guds hjarta for Efraim. Baruch Korman undervisar från Hos 11:1-10 om Guds hjarta for nordriket Efraim, som trots att de måste gå i exil i Assyrien ska bli raddade i slutandan, eftersom Gud ar helig och barmhartig.

programme.title: Kungen kommer
programme.desc: Gud har makten. Hur laser vi verserna om denna tidsålders slut? Vem har egentligen makten under de sista intensiva åren innan Messias återkomst? Är det satan och vilddjuret som styr, eller ar det Gud?

programme.title: TV7 Israelnyheter
programme.desc: TV7 Israelnyheter

programme.title: Bibliska nycklar till helande
programme.desc: Varfor finns det motstridiga viljor inom mig?. Du onskar att helhjartat folja Gud och lyda honom. Men samtidigt finns en annan vilja inom dig, som verkar vilja något helt annat. Ger Bibeln ljus over varfor du verkar ha två motstridande viljor?

programme.title: LUMO - Lukasevangeliet
programme.desc: Lukas 6:1-49. Dramatisering av evangelietexten på svenska. Jesus ar sabbatens Herre. Jesus utser tolv apostlar. Folkskaror samlas på slatten. Saligprisningar. Verop. Älska era fiender. Flisan och bjalken.

programme.title: Israel talar
programme.desc: Stora familjers valsignelse. Fodelsetalen i Israel ar bland de hogsta i vastvarlden. Det ar inte ovanligt med familjer med sex, åtta eller fler barn.

programme.title: Gershon Nerels Israel
programme.desc: Relationen mellan Israel och kristendomen 1/2. Från det fjarde århundradet blev kristendomen en accepterad religion i det romerska riket. Då uppstod forestallningen om att det var kyrkan som skulle arva Guds loften till Israel.

programme.title: Letters
programme.desc: Stegen mot frihet. Som barn blev Jenny kyrkvan, men hennes hjarta hangde inte riktigt med. I stallet ville mobilen i handen ha hennes uppmarksamhet. Med tiden borjade den dar apparaten dominera hela hennes liv.

programme.title: Cafe Bibeln Uppsala
programme.desc: Hur gor man slut på ett krig?. I lander dar manniskorna har forlorat nara och kara på grund av krig, dar behovs nåd och forlåtelse mest. Hur talar man om Jesus med manniskor som aldrig hort om evangeliet? Leif intervjuar Johan Candelin.

programme.title: Re-Formation
programme.desc: Religion som hinder for genombrott. Bengt Wedemalm forkunnar.

programme.title: Israel Art
programme.desc: Daniel Carmel – kapten på Herrens skuta. Israelfodde judiske båtkaptenen på Galileiska sjon, Daniel Carmel, leder sina passagerare i lovsång.

programme.title: TV7 Israelnyheter
programme.desc: TV7 Israelnyheter

programme.title: River Hunters
programme.desc: Siita lahtien, kun Canterburyn arkkipiispa Thomas Becket murhattiin katedraalissa vuonna 1170, uskovaiset pyhiinvaeltajat ovat etsiytyneet kaupunkiin kunnioittaakseen hanta. Tiimi etsii vieraiden pudottamia helyja ja matkamuistoja eri vuosisadoilta.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Astronomeille hyodyllinen kasite, tahtikuvio, koostuu ryhmasta tahtia, jotka muodostavat yhdessa hahmon. Jaksossa tutustutaan kuvioiden historiaan ja alkuperaan.

programme.title: Where Did It Come From?
programme.desc: Monet nykylaaketieteeseen liitetyt asiat olivat tiedossa jo muinaisten egyptilaisten keskuudessa yli 5 000 vuotta sitten. Matkaamme Egyptiin tutustumaan modernin laaketieteen syntypaikkaan.

programme.title: Unidentified: Inside Americas UFO Investigation
programme.desc: Yhdysvaltalaisen lentoyhtion pilotit raportoivat lahelta piti -tilanteesta ufon kanssa. Elizondo kuulee uuden tarinan suuren lentoyhtion lentajalta, jonka raportti hehkuvasta oranssista pallosta Arizonan ylilennolta saa tukea valokuvista.

programme.title: Muinaiset avaruusoliot
programme.desc: Arkkiin liittyvat raamatulliset tarinat viittaavat laitteeseen, jolla on taivaallisia kykyja. Ovat tarinat pelkkaa myyttia, vai oliko liiton arkki taynna eriskummallisia voimia?

programme.title: The Best of MonsterQuest
programme.desc: Jokin outo olento tappaa elaimia ja imee uhriensa veren. Onko kyseessa myyttinen chupacabra vai jokin uusi pelottava risteyma?

programme.title: Rome: Rise And Fall of an Empire
programme.desc: Vuonna 47 jKr. useat pitivat uutta keisaria, Claudiusta, typeryksena, joten ainut tapa pitaa kiinni valtaistuimesta oli hyokata Britanniaan.

programme.title: Pirate Treasure Of The Knights Templar
programme.desc: Sarjassa arvostettu arkeologi ja seikkailija Barry Clifford yrittaa ratkaista satoja vuosia vanhaa mysteeria tutkijoista ja asiantuntijoista koostuvan tiiminsa avulla.

programme.title: River Hunters

programme.title: Rome: Rise And Fall of an Empire
programme.desc: Vuonna 47 jKr. useat pitivat uutta keisaria, Claudiusta, typeryksena, joten ainut tapa pitaa kiinni valtaistuimesta oli hyokata Britanniaan.

programme.title: Pirate Treasure Of The Knights Templar
programme.desc: Sarjassa arvostettu arkeologi ja seikkailija Barry Clifford yrittaa ratkaista satoja vuosia vanhaa mysteeria tutkijoista ja asiantuntijoista koostuvan tiiminsa avulla.

programme.title: River Hunters
programme.desc: Talla kertaa ohjelmassa juontaja Rick Edwards ja mestarietsija Beau Ouimette saapuvat Britannian vanhimpaan kaupunkiin, Colchesteriin. He etsivat kaupungin vanhoista Colne-joen vesiteista todisteita Colchesterin piirityksesta.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Jaksossa tutustutaan vireilla olevaan hankkeeseen perustaa ihmissiirtokunta Marsiin. Tavoitteena on kasvattaa ruoka, kierrattaa jatevesi ja luoda hengityskelpoista ilmaa.

programme.title: Where Did It Come From?
programme.desc: Where Did It Come From? -ohjelma matkaa Meksikoon Yukatanin niemimaalle katsomaan muinaisen maailman taitavimpia astronomeja eli mayoja.

programme.title: Unidentified: Inside Americas UFO Investigation
programme.desc: Lue Elizondo on aikaisemmin eritellyt viisi ufojen ominaisuutta ja kutsuu niita ”viideksi havainnoksi”. Mutta on olemassa kuudeskin havaittava piirre, jota Elizondo ryhtyy tutkimaan. Alukset voivat aiheuttaa nakymattoman uhan.

programme.title: Muinaiset avaruusoliot
programme.desc: Monet eri muinaiset kansakunnat pitivat vuoria kaikkivoipien jumalten kotipaikkoina. Miksi niin monet eri kulttuurit jakavat uskon, etta vuorilla on yhteys yliluonnolliseen elamaan?

programme.title: The Unxplained With William Shatner
programme.desc: Modernit profeetat. Katastrofaaliset ennustukset. Nayt tulevista rikoksista. Voivatko ihmiset todella ennustaa tulevaa? Ja jos se on mahdollista, voimmeko kayttaa niin saatua tietoa valttaaksemme vaarallisia tapahtumia tulevaisuudessa?

programme.title: UFO Files
programme.desc: Huhtikuussa 1897 tunnistamaton alus teki syoksylaskun Teksasin Auroraan. Paikalliset vaittivat haudanneensa avaruusaluksen ja sen lentajan. Voidaanko katko loytaa?

programme.title: Project Impossible
programme.desc: Betoni- ja terasjattilaisten kimppuun kayminen on vaarallista. Purkutoissa yksi virhe voi maksaa hengen. Tassa jaksossa naemme luhistuvan kasinon, kemiallisten aseiden purkua ja miten siilo kaadetaan.

programme.title: River Hunters
